Summary: My stay at Hyatt House was very comfortable and restful. It is located in a safe area. The staff was helpful and responded quickly to questions and requests. The room had everything one would need including a microwave and a nice size mini-fridge. The weather was rainy so I couldn’t enjoy the balcony but it appeared to be a nice size for two to three people to enjoy. I would definitely stay here again if I traveled back to L.A.

Summary Heading: It was just an stop, but everything was fine!!!
Summary: It was just a stop, to continue to San Diego.  The check in was quick, room clean, breakfast was good. We didn't used the facilitities at all, but will stay again if needed. I love the Hyatt House's, all of them includes breakfasts.

Room was dirty and outdated. Dirty window panes and curtains. Multiple paint chipping from walls. Went for a family vacation and this was not the way we wanted it to start. We usually love hyatts but this one didn’t meet expectations.

Room tho clean was meh. Seating was uncomfortable (sunken in sofa bed couch), awkward set up with the door to the bedroom when open blocked the TV from most of the living area. why have a room that is ADA accessible with no proper seating or workspace? Shades (which were automatic but didn’t work properly) were stained, ripped and didn’t even completely close. If you can call the outside a patio (slab of uneven concrete) no furniture to sit out and am open wall of bushes, there is no usage to the “patio”. And why have a slider you cant keep open to let the fresh air in since there is no screen? Pointless. Walls are thin and doors slam shut. Half of the TV stations lose signal. Internet is spotty and continually kicks you out. I don't know how this property has the Hyatt branding

Hotel was very clean, orderly; staff were very friendly and attentive to our needs. Breakfast was great! Nice variety for different dietary preferences. I plan on staying here again & def. Recommend!!

The hotel staff was amazing, breakfast was a great selection, the room was spacious and had everything I could need for my trip to be able to cook and relax during my trip.  Totally worth the money and great location to stores and restaurants.

Great staff, and rooms, Internet needs some help as it doesn't quite work right all the time, but everything else was in order! I enjoy my stay here it is relatively quiet and close to my work and not to mention it is right next to Chilis, California Fish Grill, and some other yummy places all with in walking distance. I would also like to add that when the pool says that it is heated it means next to a jet, I would like to see that get fixed but other than that overall a good property to stay at.

Summary Heading: Business Stay at Cypress Hyatt House
Summary: I had an overall good experience.  The hotel was selected by and paid for by my employer, so not all details were available i.e. value for money since I don't know what rates were paid, but overall the room was clean and tidy.  Only minor issues with the TV remote and one lamp that didn't work.  I would stay here again for either business or personal vacation time.

Loved the suit it was much better than expected!!! Loved that parking was available free of charge. The front desk person was so helpful and happy to greet us! We will definitely stay again!! Breakfast was also great

It’s good to be a member of hyatt, I would recommend.  I love the perks of early check in and late check out. Free drinks with cookies upon arrival, the only thing that I don’t like in cypress is the H bar is close.

The hotel is in need of a remodel, it could use new paint and new flooring or carpet, hallways look dark, exterior needs a new coat of paint, etc. Other than that good customer service, responsive when I texted them, and breakfast was delicious with a variety of choices.

Pros:  Free parking, friendly staff, convenient location  Cons:  none stand out!  We travel to southern California frequently for medical visits.  We have stayed at other area Hyatts and tried this one when others didn't have availability.  I was so pleasantly surprised!  After a very early morning flight staff were able to accommodate an early check-in.  They supplied an air filter when we shared our allergy concerns, the room was clean and spacious.   The staff was very friendly and helpful and I appreciated the free parking.   This will be our go to hotel in the area going forward.

Property and rooms are comfortable and beds are amazing. Every stay has been very pleasant. Room came with a balcony overlooking fire pit area. Which hopefully I get to go down and use on my next stay!

the first room we stayed in had a sewer seepage smell in the bathroom so we had to switch out to a different room. that was great ,thanks to Romina. however, the fact that they seemed to want to hide the fact that there was a smell in the bathroom by leaving  exhaust fan on,  even before we had checked into the room, was unacceptable!

The staff was phenomenal! From the front desk to the breakfast staff and housekeeping everyone was terrific. I’ve spent a lot of time traveling and generally a room is a room, it’s the staff that is make or break on the experience.  These guys have their act together.

I would not recommend that anybody or anything stays at the Hyatt. There are so many better options than this super tiny room hotel. The room is crazy Amal and you barely have room to turn around. There was a loud noise every single night and could barely sleep. To say I’m disappointed is the bare minimum.

We were pleasantly surprised at all aspects of our experience with Hyatt House Cypress/Anaheim. It’s was all around Amazing and since we will be coming back to the are in the future we will be choosing Hyatt House Cypress/Anaheim. Thanks again.

We've been staying at this hotel for many years when visiting nearby family. The suite rooms are particularly large and comfortable.  We do feel that the in-room experience is beginning to show wear and tear on the furniture, but that it our only complaint.  The staff is consistently friendly and helpful and responsive. The breakfast seems more robust than the breakfasts at many others of this level we have stayed at. We're fans.

Our stay was great and the staff accommodating.  If water pressure in the shower is important, you will be disaapointed in that aspect.  Everything else was above average.  We needed to work from the room and the staff helped to ensure that we were placed in a room with workspace.  If workspace is important for your trip, I recommend calling ahead so that they could set aside one of the king suites with workspace.  The location is also quite good with several restaurants within walking distance.  There is a Chili's about 3 feet away and several other options.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, great staff, great stay!
Summary: As the title indicates, we were very satisfied with the hotel.  The staff was so courteous, helpful and made sure your stay was comfortable.  The location was great too.  Close to Disney parks and plenty of shopping.  Would definitely stay again.

This hotel provides everything needed to realize a great experience.  Room had all the features that are expected at a higher-class hotel. The bathroom was especially satisfying.  The shower was great!  Bed was very comfortable!

Summary Heading: Room is way too small for price
Summary: Room is way too small for price. Older hotel they are trying to make it look new. The people partying in the hallway in the middle of the night woke us up. I used to really like Hyatt. Would not recommend.

My room was clean, I would stay again. Conveniently located. The Wi-Fi was very slow. I had to use my Hotpot on my phone. Good to know if you are there on business. The bar is open from 5-10 but I went in twice durning that time to order a hamburger and there was nobody around.

Summary Heading: Nice location in a great community
Summary: The hotel is located in Cypress, CA just a short drive to Disneyland, and the beaches!  Great staff and comfortable rooms.  We have lodged here several times and is our choice when visiting family and friends in the area.  Highly recommended!

The overall experience of our staycation was excellent. From the front desk check in to a lovely, clean room and a yummy breakfast by the pool, best Hyatt House stay hands down! Keep up the great service!

Summary Heading: Very nice and quiet hotel to stay when visiting OC
Summary: I love how they add their small touch to their breakfast, it is mostly outstanding and a great to start the day with, very pleasant host. The hotel is not that new but it was well maintained, one of the great things about the location it's parking is complementary and I hope it stays this way.

Great place for a family of five when you need a suite.  Clean, comfortable, with all the basic necessities.  Great value for the quality and service you receive.  Would definitely recommend, and stay here again.

The staff here are amazing and very responsive. Location is nice. Although seems to be remodeled but you can easily say it is an old building. We stayed on the first floor and room had smell of those very old building.

While the hotel was clean and comfortable, it appears that someone entered my room and took 2 pairs of pants and a shirt. I called later in the day right after check out to report that the items were not in my suitcase and the hotel says that housekeeping did not find anything. This is a bit concerning and the hotel did not have any answers on how a pair of pants I wore to the hotel, just disappeared.

The room looks dated, and we keep losing electricity when we use the Hotel’s hairdryer. The AC wasn’t working right, sometimes the room would get very warm, and sometimes it would get very cold.  My mom wasn’t feeling well during the stay, and the fire alarm went off and gave her an anxiety attack which cause her condition worsened. The staff didn’t even asked if we’re ok.  Worst hotel experience!

Summary Heading: Extra clean and wonderful place to stay
Summary: Always a great experience, this hotel is immaculately clean, has great staff, and great customer service. I’m so glad the were able to accommodate me and I was able to get a great breakfast and good sleep before my realtors exam.

If you have top tier of WOH membership, noting hope to this property. this property have only few of guest king room. so 1bed king is standard room ton this property.  and then when all room type available, when you check-in. they only offer paid upgrade.even if 1king bed to 2 queen bed. they said they only comp upgrade available guest king room to 1 bed king to globalist. onemore fun, about guest king room. that room only have 3 to 5 room at there property. it mean usually you can find that type of room. 1 king bed is real standard room at there.  so if you have elite membership, I recommend make a reservations via 3rd party website. it is more good option to this property. because via WOH reservations is no mean to this property. I never has been experience to when all room is

We were here on an extended stay as we were looking for a home in the area. No issues during that time and we found the quality of the amenities and staff professionalism to meet Hyatt standards (even moreso / with greater consistency than higher-category Hyatt properties where we have previously stayed).  We had a full kitchen (minus an oven), even with a freezer and ice-maker.  I want to commend the entire front-desk team ‒ we had positive experiences with pretty much everybody so I can't name a particular individual.  We also appreciated the communication and attention from our housekeeper Silvia. I definitely recommend this stay over Airbns as well as higher priced Hyatt properties in the area.

I didn't expect all the space.  I felt like I could relax and breath and people were not standing on top of each other.  The staff was very pleasant and helpful.  I would most definitely stay there again.  My back never had issues and usually the beds cause eventual back pain.  Not on this trip!

The front desk staff were friendly and efficient. The ADA King Suite was larger than expected and included many items to make a longer stay convenient, such as full fridge/freezer. The bed was comfortable and clean. The breakfast buffet was basic but good.

I was guaranteed a full kitchen, and little did I know, I came into my room and there was only a microwave and mini-fridge. It was a nightmare. I chose this place to try a different room, and it was the same as all the other hotels.

This place was fine. The Breakfast was definitely the cheapest "food" they could find - definitely garbage compared to other Hyatt Houses. I also didn't like how they said it would be $20/night to upgrade to a room with two beds even though I have Globalist Status - that's never happened to me.

We stay at the Cypress/Anaheim hotel to celebrate our 33rd Wedding anniversary. Trishi and Amalia, along with the staff were amazing! They acknowledged our anniversary upon check-in and with a special in-room treats; in which we truly enjoyed and will always remember!   As a matter of fact, we were so impressed we have told our friends about the hotel and are planning our next stay. Thank you for the wonderful hospitality, customer service to the entire Hyatt House Cypress/Anaheim team!! Susie and Mark Green

I will be back..  I work for Baker Electric so Hyatt is close enough to get to work easy but far enough away to enjoy my time off. Jackie Harris is excellent and fun to talk to. I appreciate the work that went in to cleaning the room and the Layout is great. Stayed in room 363. Love that balcony.

We enjoyed our week long stay at this hotel.  The beds were comfy and the room was clean.  It was nice to have a kitchen in the room.  The breakfast was great and the staff was very nice.  I will definitely stay here next year.

We stayed a week for my Child’s  sporting event (softball team). They played a national elimination tournament so if you lose, you are out of the tournament t. The hotel did not let us check out early when we lost the tournament with out being charged for the nights we checked out early.most hotels work with teams. This hotel did not

Summary Heading: Good stay, quiet hours not enforced.
Summary: Stay was not as good as we had in 2017, rooms could be cleaned better and quiet hours could/should be enforced. The room had a stale cooling smell that didn’t go away even with the freshener that was offered to us.

the hotel is clean, staff was friendly and helpful, definitely a place to go to and to stay, if they didn't use plastic silver and not reusable plates for everything: in these days with all our environmental issues this should be something every guest should complain about, at least people who use their brains to think... If it wasn't for this I would rate this hotel even better..

Summary Heading: Nice hotel with great staff close to Disneyland
Summary: I highly recommend this hotel for Disneyland stays. The staff was very accommodating, the room was immaculate and the pillows were great. I am a very satisfied customer. The breakfast options were OK given Covid.

Great Breakfast , clean rooms, great location to theme parks and excellent customer service. They have a jacuzzi,  swimming pool and a modern equipped Gym. This place is family friendly  and my kids loved it.

Lovely place to stay!  They served an awesome breakfast, with hot and cold items each day and it changed a little each day. Perfect location for Disney, beaches, Aquarium of the Pacific and other attractions.   Very clean and spacious! Very helpful front desk.

Near a bunch of the touristy stuff in Buena Park/Anaheim. We had a one bedroom suite, and it had a real kitchen with a full-sized fridge. We had also a sofa sleeper that pulled out into a ~queen, worked out well traveling with two young kids. Pet-friendly - we got a ground floor room with sliding door access direct outside, so we could take our puppers directly outside without wandering through a hotel hallway first.  Breakfast is complementary and is pretty standard-fare for a hotel breakfast buffet, definitely a step up from the "continental" offerings you might see elsewhere.

Every single staff member at Hyatt house Cypress/Anaheim was excellent. They were all professional and knowledgeable. Over my 4 month stay they treated me with the upmost respect and were very accommodating. If I could of stayed longer I surely would have.

Stayed here a few weeks after Hyatt Flushing. From check in to check out was great. Everyone was pleasant and helpful. The daily breakfast was very good. I appreciated the cleanliness and the responsiveness when I needed extra pillows, toilet paper or locked myself out of the room.

The service is good and the staffs are friendly. There're planty of restaurants just in walking distance.  My only problem is that there's odor from carpet in my room. Thanks the house's staff for assisting us to get the new room. From my observation, the house is a bit dated, especially the carpet is a bit old. That's why there's odor from the carpet.

It was a nice stay, the rooms are dated but clean. Breakfast is as expected. There are times we had a hard time looking for a parking spot as the hotel was full of guest at the time. The staff were very helpful and accomodating. We will stay here again.

Summary Heading: Average condition of rooms and terrible breakfast
Summary: Carpet in room had musty odor. WiFi didn’t work since signal strength was extremely poor. We were made to change our room since they couldn’t get it to work. Breakfast was cheap, boring and repetitive.

I will not recommend. I hope they will be able to upgrade everything in the room.  Breakfast area was not clean.  There was no everyday cleaning of rooms.  Airconditioning system is very noisy.  Hope they will improve on facilities.

My family and I stayed at this HYATT house Cypress/Anaheim over Memorial Day weekend into Tuesday morning.  The King suite is excellent and accommodating.  The Man and Woman Restromm were just a few steps from our suite and were much a convenience.  Hot breakfast, including bacon, on one morning day was much appreciated.  Definitely stay here again on next family vacation

I was surprised when I entered the reception area, staff welcomed us, I didn't respond right away because I was looking at the decor .... It was really cool, the King suite was very nice, breakfast was pretty good. I will come back on staycation.

This was the best hotel for a big family.  We loved our suite!  We especially loved having access to a grill and grilling tools.  We enjoyed a nice grilled chicken and veggie dinner thanks to Hyatt.  Highly recommend.  The kids loved the pool.  Breakfast was amazing.

We staued at the property during the Memorial Day weekend and the hotel was full. The room had a kitchen, a king bed in the room and a sofa bed in the sitting room. The toilet and shower were in one room together but the sink was outside. The trash can was inside the toilet. I think this set up can be improved a lot more. A bidet would be most appreciated and a trash can by the sink would help. There was so little room in the shower to fit the soap, shampoo, conditioner, and other bath stuff.   The rooms were cleaned only after 3 days. It's hotel policy not to clean the room every day. But if you have enough loyalty points then you're eligible for more frequent cleaning.  What we enjoyed the most was the free breakfast. There were sausages, pancakes, eggs, fruits and diff kinds

Hotel was above par, Greeted by front desk staff, all staff were helpful and professional,  rooms were clean and welcoming, breakfast options were great.  Will definitely stay here again when in the area.

Summary Heading: One of the Best Hyatt Properties in Orange County, California
Summary: This is my favorite Hyatt property in Orange County, CA. The staff is wonderful and the property is in excellent condition. The breakfast has nearly any thing you could want, huge selection. The bar has a really good burger and strong drinks.

We have stayed at this hotel several times over the last few years. This is a great hotel to stay. The staffs are very helpful. The rooms are clean and breakfast is good. We have always  enjoyed our stay.

Nice location and environment; good facility. Breakfast is good. Night is quiet. Room is clean. Staff is helpful and friendly. Easy travel. Nice weather. Everything is good. I enjoyed my stay here. I thus recommend to everyone

Great place to stay. Staff was super friendly. Kitchen was stocked with everything I needed. Breakfast was great and they even offered gluten free cereal! Location was convenient and very close to Long Beach Airport.

Need to have more choices of soap, and shampoo.  We would also like to have a bathtub, that would be important.  We liked the Gym, and also the Pool area.  Also the Barbecue, is nice and needed to have some silver ware.

Lovely helpful staff, great outdoor BBQ/fire pit/pool and hot tub area. Room was large and comfortable for our family for 5 nights. Plenty to eat at breakfast. Was nice to have parking and WIFI included so no hidden extra costs. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the feedback! we are super excited to learn you enjoyed your stay with us. We cannot wait to welcome you back.

Summary: We liked this place and it was very near to Disney and California adventure park. Very helpful staff and nice breakfast. We did got chance to come back to hotel to take some rest during Disney visit. So many food options near by.
Manager Response: Woo Hoo! We are overjoyed to learn that you enjoyed your last stay with us. WE cannot wait to welcome you back to our property! Don't make us wait too long.

Summary Heading: Very spacious and very nice staff
Summary: We were greeted by a very friendly young lady. We were checked in promptly. The room was spacious and nice. The breakfast was surprisingly better than most hotels.  The lobby was also spacious and very accommodating.  I will definitely stay there again, even longer period of time next time.
Manager Response: We hope you come back and stay with us again soon! Thanks for letting us know you were happy with your stay.

Summary: Nice rooms, a little expensive but that's OK.    Staff was real nice.   Good location.   No bar/restaurant.  The hotel breakfast was probably the worst breakfast ever.   Quality and selection of food was terrible.

The room was very nice and breakfast was really good. Only thing I did not like was that I asked for room service and didn’t get our trash thrown out we only received clean towels.. other than that I would definitely return again!
Manager Response: We thrilled you enjoyed your stay. Sorry about the mix up with your room being serviced. We will make sure to get that right next time.

Summary: Large suite with patio / balcony, awesome free breakfast (including hot food options like bacon, eggs, hashbrowns) outdoor pool and spa, very nice courtyard area, nice exercise room, super professional and friendly staff. I’d definitely stay here again. Everything was clean and great.

Convenient location with fair price, vs other hotels "closer" to the sights.  I had a king-bed room.  It was the little things that got me:  I arrived at night, in the dark, I have no idea where the light switches are in this room, so it would have been nice to have at least one light on as I walked in.  Idea:  glow in the dark light switches since we are not familiar with the room lights.  Shower stall - to turn on water, you had to get wet!  Main light for bathroom is opposite from door.  Bathroom door don't open fully due to narrowness in the room.  refrigerator door very well sealed, hard to open the door.  AC air flow right over bed, very strong "wind" so had to put a pillow in front of the vent to minimize blowing directly on me in bed.  Mattress had a valley, time to

Great place to stay specially for families with kids going to theme parks in LA.  You have option to make your own meals (kitchen is full size) or do the restaurants nearby.  The king bedroom suite have a completely separate room and a pull-out sofa bed.

Very clean and the staff was friendly and accommodating to our needs.  The hotel has a beautiful outside patio area to visit with family and friends also staying at the hotel and living in the area.  Our deluxe President Suite was fabulous!

If you book a 'regular' room, you will have a refrigerator that runs LOUDLY all night. The dresser drawers, when items are in them, will not stay closed without sticking a tea bag in to keep them shut. Maddening ...
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that you were not pleased with your stay. We hope to get the opportunity to welcome you again in the future.

Summary: My room was very dusty and the bathroom was poorly cleaned. Long strands of someone's hair was all over the floor. The staff was nice but the room itself was not. However the bed was nice and clean and slept well. I shortened my 3 nights stay to 1 and moved to a different location within the Hyatt brand and was VERY pleased.

Stayed here for 3 nights on business.  The best thing about this hotel is the kitchen.  I did not cook a lot this time, but next time I may.  I got a 1-bedroom suite and it is pretty roomy.  The place was clean. Internet was fine.  Check in was easy. Plenty of parking. Breakfast was aceeptable with hot meal. Location was close to highway.    99 Ranch market and Sam Woo Chinese restaurance was within 2 miles away. Will come back again

Summary Heading: Great Hotel In a Great Location
Summary: First off I must say that I booked this location by mistake.  I originally intended to book the Hyatt next to Disneyland park.  That said, this was a fortuitous mistake.  The hotel is clean.  The staff is friendly.  The location is a bit off the tourist grid, but that is a good thing.  The location is in a business neighborhood and feels safe enough to not worry about leaving a vehicle overnight in the parking lot.  It was a quick 15 min drive to the park.  This hotel is on my list of places to stay for future visits in Anaheim.

One of the cheapest Hyatt property in the area and with free parking. Really clean and well maintained. I really enjoyed my stay here. I would not hesitate to stay here again if I am in the area next time.

As always, my family and I enjoyed our stay. Staff are very friendly, the rooms are clean. Hotel location is in a quiet neighborhood.  The hotel is surrounded by many restaurants that are within walking distance.

Room was filthy! Shower was not cleaned and was filthy due to feces stains on the walls!! I cleaned the shower by purchasing the correct cleaning supplies! Room smelled like urine that permeated from the carpet. Sir conditioning was too cold and really loud and could not keep the room regulated, plus there was not filter in the return vent!! How could you not have a filter in the return vent during covid???!!! Surfaces were not wiped down because there were greasy hand prints and grease everywhere so I purchased sanitizing wipes and cleaned the whole room. Sheets smelled unwashed so I purchased sheets and put clean sheets on. Mattress was so lumpy we couldn’t sleep. Blackout roller shade was torn so the room never got blacked out.   This was our first time traveling since covid

We enjoyed our stay at this hotel.. perfect distance to Disney and restaurants all around.. Their rooms were very accomadating and spacious, their beds were comfy and the view to the pool and area outside was awesome we definitely will come back and stay again.

Had the best time staying in California at The best stay in California at the Hyatt, just a few tweaks towards promotions, breakfast, and cleanliness to the bathrooms would’ve made this trip perfect!!
Manager Response: Wow! We are so thrilled and honored to hear such great feedback! We are beyond hoping we get to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary: Bad things: cleanliness of The towels, and the room (316) smelled like animal piss.  Good things :Location, breakfast, free parking, bed comfort, balcony, check in and check out times. The reason for this score is because the room smell like animal piss and towels having spots could happen anywhere
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that you're room did not measure up to your standards. We would have loved the opportunity to address this while you were with us. Thank you for your feedback. We hope to host you again in the future.

Summary: It was comfortable. Could be a bit cleaner though. Nice size, couch was not super comfortable, could tell it had been used a lot…had a suite with two queens. Great location if you want quiet after and long Disney day though. Breakfast was hot and ready everyday. Too cold to swim…But nice pool, and we felt safe there even though close to Anaheim/La vicinity.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you'll visit us again.

Summary: I liked that there was a wine opener, glasses, coffee machine, microwave and refrigerator in the room. Free continental breakfast. Good for a cheap vacation. The price was good but if you’re a clean freak like me, you could find better.
Manager Response: We are clad to hear you enjoyed your stay. We cannot wait to see you again.

Summary: We came just for a night out with our 2 children. When opened the door we were excited about the size and setup of the room. Everytime we stay out my wife takes her Lysol and wipes down everything. The washcloth was fully brown just from wiping the island, bar stool seats, night stand and table tops. The shower had hard water on walls and hardware, rust on towel rack and couch cushions did not stay in place enough to be comfortable. There were splatters of food on the cabinets and coffee drippings on the counters, microwave was dirty, the refrigerator had sticky stuff inside as well. This suite would have been great but the details is where it counts. We didn’t call the front desk over these things because after my wife cleaned everything we were comfortable enough to just enjoy
Manager Response: I am sorry the cleanliness of your room failed to meet your expectations. We would have loved to address your concerns during your stay. We hope you will find your room more suitable during a future visit.

Summary: We booked 2 suites rooms. The carpet is not vacuumed very well. When you turn on the Air condition the dust is coming out. And also the breakfast is still the same every day like eggs, sausage & bacon.
Manager Response: We are sad to hear that you were not full satisfied with your stay. We hope you can make it up to you on a future visit.

Summary: Mediocre hotel that needs to be updated. The staff was very helpful. The hotel is not very clean. The only upside is the central location to the beach and surrounding cities. I would recommend this hotel only for value
Manager Response: I'm sorry you found your room cleanliness to be below what you were expecting. We would have loved to address this with you while you were with us. We hope that you will visit us again, and allow us the opportunity to change your perception.

Summary: Not well kept, old, furniture was chipped and spot painted, TV service was outdated and difficult to use, plus the TV had several bright spots since it had been damaged, walls and carpets, floors dirty throughout the hotel, faceplates were frequently covered with a silver sticky cover to try to cover up the old and damaged originals.  Seemed to have clean rooms but needs work.  Need to hire at least one person to go around wiping things down, typical of US hotels, fired most of the staff, nobody left to do the basics like wipe off counters of food, wipe fingerprints or other filth off walls, elevators, buttons, etc, often felt like grabbing the refrigerator door handle at home after the kids forgot to wipe their hands and opened it before me.
Manager Response: We are sorry that your visit did not measure up to your expectations. We hope you'll try us again in the future.

Summary: Traveled to cypress for the New Year to be with family. I stayed in a king suite and was able to enjoy a full kitchen with dining area and a living area. Overall pleased with my stay here at the Hyatt House.
Manager Response: Thanks for visiting us. We hope to we hope to welcome you and your family back in the future.

Summary: With kids traveling together, this is the best place to stay close to Anaheim. We had to wait a little bit for the room to be ready after check in time, but I understand the struggles everyone has. The wait time was only 15 mins. The staff was friendly and flexible of providing what I requested. The room was clean. I can trust this location. No complains at all.
Manager Response: This is great news! We hope to see you again the next time you're in our area.

Summary: Great place with excellent service to stay while our house was being repaired due to flood damage. The staff was great and love the fact that there is security that patrols the parking lot at night. The staff went above and beyond to provide a great experience for us. I highly recommend this establishment.
Manager Response: Wonderful! we are thrilled you were so pleased with your stay.

Summary Heading: Friendly Hotel Staff - Great Location - Terrific Breakfast
Summary: The front desk staff is very welcoming and helpful.  They had answers to all my questions, offered suggestions for restaurants and recreational activities. Rooms are very clean, nice bed linens and pillows - overall room size is just a bit small since it is an older facility.  Beautiful courtyard with BBQ gas grills, sitting areas and outdoor pool.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the positive words! We could not be happier to hear that your experience was great with us!

Summary: Kids running up and down hallways at 11:30pm, no screen on balcony door so could not leave open and very disappointed for a $200 a night,  but staff is very friendly and room is spacious and lots of room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so sorry to hear about the concerns you shared. While our rooms do not have screen doors on the balconies, we take noise complaints very seriously and work diligently to minimize these whenever possible. We hope you will choose to give us another opportunity!

Summary: Good place to stay with family. Kitchen available, table, private room, living room with sofa bed available for the kids. Great location. Only 4 miles away from Knott’s Berry Farms. 15 minutes from Disney Downtown.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the positive review!

Summary: This hotel is spotless and has extremely courteous employees. Given the COVID restrictions, the breakfast was quite good as were the selections. The location is perfect for access to area attractions and close (but not too close) to major highways.
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive words, Randy! We are so happy you enjoyed your recent visit!

Summary: The room was dirty, there is an extension cord under the rug, hardly safe, and would not meet code in most cities   Service from the desk is nearly non-existant, and the decor is nearly ready for a destination as historical.  Ugly mid-century    DO NOT PICK THIS DUMP
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel! We are so disappointed to hear this feedback of your recent stay. We do not currently have record of the items you mentioned; please reach out to us directly if we can assist further.

Summary: I like the location, it is very quiet and surrounded by several food options. I enjoy using the app to check-in and the free breakfast. I did not get to use the pool or the gym this time, but they look well cared for.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us such kind comments!

Summary: Stayed because the location was convenient to where I was working.    Last time I stayed, it was in a suite with a kitchen,  This time a king single.    I think the suite was less expensive.    Really did not like the fact you had to get a cold shower to turn the shower on.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback! We certainly understand the concerns surrounding our shower configurations and are working to rectify this small detail. We are so happy the rest of your stay was great!

Summary: I read many of the reviews previously left and I saw several about unfriendly Staff, Front Desk and garbage in the hallways.  I wanted to change my hotel, but it was last minute and would have been hit with cancellations fees.  I normally don't reviews, but wanted to for this.  I read these negative reviews and wanted to change my mind and glad I didn't.  Then Front Desk Staff was beyond friendly and helpful.  All of the other staff was the same and as for garbage in the halls, I didn't see any.  The rooms were clean and spacious and we loved the full kitchen.  The outdoor area was great too.  If you are reading reviews and see this one, I can say that we were happy that we stayed there and would do so again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for leaving us your feedback! We could not be happier to know that your stay with us exceeded your expectations and that we were able to leave a lasting impression. We can't wait to see you again soon!

Summary: A nice hotel at a convenient location.Hot breakfast is included along with fresh cut up fruit and most continental selections.  The King Suite is roomy, comfortable, yet private, with double doors to the bedroom.  Staff is extremely competent and efficient. They do allow pets, I think on just the first floor. but I like that the rooms are tagged as such. The grounds are nice and the halls smell fresh.The rates are competitive for the quality.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the positive words! We are so thankful you had such wonderful things about your recent stay with us!

Summary: BE AWARE….this hotels has and keeps criminals working for them. I recently had 2000 dollars stolen from me out of room 360! Also they only clean the rooms every 3 days.  When delivering clean towels the maids go thru your belongings and take the ever they want. Management says “sorry" STAY AWAY if you value your possessions !
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so disappointed to know that your recent stay with us was not enjoyable. We are, however, glad to know that our team was able to assist with a full investigation with local law enforcement to ensure this issue was resolved. We hope you will choose to give us another opportunity in the future should your travels bring you back to Cypress.

Summary: Found the inside room with a view of the pool to be a bit small but adequate for our needs. The suite next to us had a balcony overlooking the pool that look nice. The lobby had a large seating area that was nice. The bar was nice and had a happy hour that we didn’t have time to make. There was also a nice eating area that served a free breakfast that provided many options. Check and out was very easy and the staff was very friendly and inviting. Free parking was a plus. Would recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us your comments! We couldn't be happier to know that our hotel met your expectations. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Room was noisy throughout the day.  Think storage or work room directly behind our hotel room and it sounded like running water through the pipes.  Told the manager but no follow through or other room offered for our two night stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are disappointed to know that your recent stay was interrupted by a water sound in the pipes. Rest assured our engineers have taken a look at this and have made efforts to reduce this sound so as not to interrupt our guests' comfort during stays with us. We hope you will choose to provide us with another opportunity to serve you in the future!

Summary: I had a room facing Corporate Ave. The room was clean and generally quiet (there was noise from helicopters from a nearby army base; that ended by 9 pm pt). The wifi worked well.  The breakfast was post-COVID acceptable -- take-out, but at least it was hot (eggs, french toast, bacon).  It looked like the pool was closed during my stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments! We, too, are excited to see our breakfast spread return to normalcy and hope this will happen soon. We hope to welcome you back again to enjoy our pool, open daily from 10am-10pm!

Summary: Great place to stay. Clean rooms and friendly staff. Breakfast was great considering COVID restrictions. Setup allowed for social distancing while still allowing for many options. Much better than any other hotel we’ve stayed at.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words, Tammy!

Summary: Front Desk Personnel (a few of the Females) were just horrible and had attitudes. I don't care Who They are or what their issue is, their primary responsibility is to be the face of the company therefore, should act as such!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! Rest assured we pride ourselves on providing excellent service to all of our guests, and this has been promptly addressed.

Summary: good so far this hotel.  but i don't want to review over 200 characters write word. Just good for me and clean room nice breakfast. I want to stay with family next time again so don't ask anymore 200 more characters.
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive words!

Summary Heading: Room smells and low wifi speed
Summary: The front desk agents are friendly but some hardware of the hotel is terrible. The Wi-Fi disconnects constantly and suffers from low speed(typically 5Mbps, which makes everything impossible). I had some works to do and had to use my cell phone as a hotspot. It costed me a lot extending my cellular data plan to survive these five days. The room ventilation is also a problem. When we first entered the room it had a slight smell and it got worse when we stayed longer. The agent helped us switch to a new room but the room got a smell since day two. What makes things more intolerable is that we hear the snooze from our neighbor's room… It is a bit unexpected.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us feedback on your recent stay! We are so sorry to hear that your room had an odor; rest assured we take great care to ensure our rooms are in excellent condition and we will look into this immediately with our teams. Additionally, we are always happy to help with Wi-Fi concerns if needed, and we have a help desk that is able to solve most connection challenges - please let us know if you plan to return to Cypress and we will ensure a smooth stay!

Summary: Room was filthy with stains on the curtains. Missing remote from living room  Garbage is out always in the hallways   Room was listed online as separate access to bathroom  Unsafe people sleeping in cars out in the parking lot  Zero water pressure in the shower  Called prior to the trip (Monday) was advised shuttle within 5 miles from hotel. It is also on the website that it is available. This is not the case  6:50 am called the room to say we are too loud we had been sitting in the couch and someone straightening  hair Zero noise   Staff in every interaction have been rude and disrespectful. I am tempted not to finish my stay and will never return
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so sorry to hear that you didn't enjoy your stay with us. Cleanliness is of the utmost importance to us, and we have addressed your comments with our housekeeping team to ensure these are addressed. We do take security very seriously and have a dedicated security team to eliminate any safety concerns. We hope you will choose to return to visit us in the future!

Summary: Hotel room has a beautiful kitchen. Most everything in the hotel seems like new. The bed and pillows are the best out of all the hotels I have stayed at in the past 30 years. The location is central to L.A. and Orange County. Location is in a quiet area of Cypress, California. Location of hotel is close to the 405, 605 and 22 freeways. Surprisingly for breakfast they have hard boiled Kosher eggs in a sealed package with the OU symbol. Tea bags and sealed oatmeal containers are also Kosher. Only odd thing about the hotel is having a $100 credit hold for each night staying. Example is if staying 10 days then have a $1000 credit hold even though already paid in advance for the stay. Final though is that the hotel is an excellent place to stay at and hopefully in the future the
Manager Response: Wow, what kind feedback! We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Great location, in the middle of a lot of places of interest. The breakfast is nice, lots of parking available. Staff is fantastic though cleaning should be improved on, at least trash pick-up and fresh towels daily, property could use a remodel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! We will share your feedback with our teams - thank you for sharing it with us!

Summary: It just wasn't at all what we were expecting. It was over priced for the uncleanly room. 2x the amount of a deposit unlike close competitors. I was sad wanted to leave asap. Not a comfortable experience
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us your feedback! We are so sorry that you didn't enjoy your stay with us; please feel free to reach out to our team directly anytime - we are happy to promptly address any concerns sent our way, and are committed to resolving these prior to departure. Thank you!

Summary Heading: Not the standard I expect from Hyatt
Summary: Hotel was a little run down. Room was clean but the kitchen area had a musty smell. Mask policies weren't enforced for other guests or staff. I originally was put in the wrong room type upon check in. Overall a pretty lackluster and disappointing stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments! We are so sorry to know that your room was not up to your expectations; we have addressed this with our team to ensure it does not occur again. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: I’m  being using this place for years .. and it was nice and quite. I was trying to sleep and all I heard was music on the parking lot crazy people arguing it was so disturbing.. for my kids. I want it make it a wonderful experience for my family since it was my birthday but totally different.. as well I asked for towels and only one person provided towels after no one delivery towels after calling several times.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that your stay with us was anything less than amazing. It's unfortunate you were so disturbed by the atmosphere outside. We certainly would have addressed this issue immediately. We are also sorry you did not receive enough towels to meet your needs. We hope you will give us another chance in the future to change your impression. Lastly, Happy Birthday!

Summary Heading: If only the guests of this hotel would match their customer service and cleansiness!!
Summary: Loved this hotel.  Staff were courtesy, always helpful and the hotel (both in and outside) were being cleaned nonstop.  The only downfall of this stay were the rude guests who were there and the nonstop partying they were having at the pool.  My recommendation to the hotel:  shift the pool hours from 10-10pm to 9am - 9pm.   Quiet hours are supposed to start at 9pm, but when you have a pool open until 10pm, you invited unruly guests to stay there until 10pm.  Staff tried to quiet them down, but to no avail.   Again, not the fault of the hotel for having rude guests, but there is a solutions to prevent this from happening again.   Future guests - do NOT stay at a ground level room next to the pool if are an early go to bed type of have young kids whose bedtime is at 730pm (like
Manager Response: We are so happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. Please let us know next time you plan to visit. We will be sure to set you up with a room away from the courtyard area.

Summary: Great spacious clean room with great service and smiles from staff..I love this place..There are many food spots near by..nice pool and outdoor area..The best quality for your dollar..You will be so satisfied with your stay and come back again and again
Manager Response: We are all so excited to read about your AWESOME stay with us. It's thrilling to know that you enjoyed your stay so much. We invite you to visit us again anytime. Maybe even bring a friend! We'd love to WOW them too!

Summary: Water from kitchen sink backed up to dishwasher and flooded the kitchen and was not resolved till next morning. I called the front desk and they came just to bring towels to soak up the floor. Water continued to leak cause I needed to wash dishes to use for dinner
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear you had struggles using the dishwasher in your room. Unfortunately we do not have an engineering staff member on site around the clock. We hope you allow the opportunity to service you again in the future.

Summary: We've stayed here numerous times and it's always been great. We just came back from our LA trip and they were attentive, caring, and we felt safe here. No frills, just top-notch in accommodation. Thank you for all your help!
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us!  Please visit us again anytime you're in the area we would love to host you again.

Summary Heading: Felt Like a King in our King Suite
Summary: We stayed at the Hyatt House Cypress/Anaheim for a business trip at the recommendation of a colleague and were more than pleasantly surprised.  The suite was laid out nicely and spacious with more amenities than we needed. And breakfast was delicious and packaged to stay safe during current times.  Definitely staying there during future trips!
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed feeling like royalty during your visit with us! Please visit us again for another "Kingly" experience in the future.

Summary: We had a great experience in this hotel. The staff was friendly, the pool was clean and we were very comfortable in our room. We liked the fact that the pool hours were well into the evening and that we could easily access the pool as well. The continental breakfast was delicious.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words! We are so happy that your stay was great!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel with friendly & helpful staff
Summary: We had a short stay at this hotel. Our room was clean & comfortable - we were upgraded to a 1-bedroom unit in recognition of Explorist status.  Every employee we interacted with was friendly & helpful. Breakfast was better than expected (in the COVID era).  Lots of dining options within a short walk (and it felt safe to walk in this area after dark).  We will definitely stay again next time we're in town.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us a review! We look forward to your next stay!

Summary Heading: nice service but poor sound isolation
Summary: the sound isolation is so bad that I could hear people talk from the next room and the hallway.  my room door's gap is almost 2inch, I could see people pass by and talk in my room and not even talk about people close their room's door and walk around.  Chromecast broke all the time.  flaking ceiling in the bathroom slow drain in the bath tub no enough outlet
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! It sounds like your stay was less than perfect, and this is disappointing as we strive to ensure our guests all have an excellent time with us. We will ensure these items are addressed immediately; thank you for sharing them with us.

Summary: Everything was fine except they gave me the smallest possible room as I used points for the stay. Thanks Hyatt for rewarding my loyalty!  That said, hotel staff was fantastic and helpful. Location is great as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments! Rest assured we are happy to upgrade our Elite Members as often as possible as availability allows. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Nasty dog or cat's pee in room 246
Summary: We stayed here on the weekend of 06/12/2021 in room# 246, a 2-queen suite.  The hotel looked nice and clean on the outside.  However, this hotel is pet-friendly, but all they will  do is vacuum and change the sheets and towels.  Room 246 reeked of cat or dog pee.  You are hit with this nasty odor when you step in the door, every time.  We ran the AC constantly, but the smell lingered.  The kitchen floor was always sticky.  Because of the pandemic, the dining room was closed.  Breakfast is served to-go style with a choice of cold or hot breakfast.  The breakfast was not good at all.  Unless you enjoy dog and cat's pee, I would not recommend you staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us your comments! We are so sorry that your stay was not as expected; rest assured our guests with pets are place on our ground floor for easy pet relief access. We hope you will choose to visit us again in the future.

Summary: We've stayed a couple of times at this Hyatt House and we've never been disappointed.  They are a very clean dog friendly hotel.  The rooms are large and clean. its also within walking distance of several restaurants
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the lovely comments!

Summary: We had a quiet corner suite. Enjoyed the full kitchen and full sized refrigerator. (Keeping kosher and having a half gallon of milk for my coffee was so nice) It surpassed our expectations. Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words!

Summary: The Hyatt house Cypress/Anaheim is much better than I expect. I especially like their free parking and free breakfast. The room is spacious and very clean. I would recommend stay there for visiting Disneyland and Newport beach
Manager Response: What a pleasure it is to know that your stay with us was wonderful!

Summary: During the pandemic, I was taking care of covid patients. To help protect my family from Exposure. They let me stay at Hayat House.. the room is very nice and fully furnished with a kitchen. Always had a good rest/sleep after a hard shift. It helped a lot that the room was always kept clean and quiet. The staff were very nice and helpful.. thanks  Hayat House Staff...
Manager Response: We are so thankful for the work you do, and are happy to know that your stay with us was relaxing!

Summary Heading: Hyatt House Cypress/Anaheim stay for business
Summary: Excellent place to stay.  Very helpful staff in all areas:  check in/check out, housekeeping, kitchen.  Superior room cleanliness and adherence to CDC guidelines for the protection of hotel guests and staff alike.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for leaving us such kind comments!

Summary: If you’re looking for a condo like feel, this is it. Very spacious, modern and the customer service is amazing. Their express check out is ideal. You can tell they put thought into the design of the rooms or shall I say high end condos.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words - we are pleased to know that our large rooms were a great fit for your time with us!

Summary: The Hyatt House in Cypress was better than I expected. The front desk, kitchen and housekeeping extremely professional and kind.  I was sad to leave.  Even during the covid-19 pandemic I felt safe there. The gym eventually opened which was great. The free breakfast and hot coffee/tea every morning I am going to miss. The front desk was very helpful if I had concerns.
Manager Response: It is such a delight to know that we exceeded your expectations during your stay!

Summary: Not only is the property gorgeous and very well maintained, the staff from the moment we arrived was attentive, caring, and exceptionally helpful while social distancing and maintaining cleanliness. Will definitely return and recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us a review! It's a pleasure to know that our cleanliness standards and social distancing measures were appreciated. See you again soon!

Summary: Staff was very professional and polite everything was perfect. Very clean and close to everything.. The rooms were immaculate. Everything you need away from home...Great location...A nice clean and comfortable environment. Thank You
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us your feedback! We couldn't be more glad to know that our hotel met your needs. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great location for my business needs. Friendly professional staff.
Summary: Excellent service. Clean rooms, relatively quiet, friendly staff. Perfect location for my business trip. Will definitely stay again when I work out of the same office. Was able to walk to the office and there was plenty of good food around!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We're so happy to know that our location was perfect for your trip!

Summary: Always great when I stay at the Hyatt. I’ve stayed here several times already and I’ve always loved my stay. Amazing staff and well organized facility. I enjoyed my stay and will stay here again soon.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This place is great we have stayed here a few times and our dog is welcome as well, easy and smooth, breakfast was great! The place was clean the only thing my kids complained about was there was no bath, just a shower! Great all around!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We're so happy that your stay with the family, complete with your furry friend, was made wonderful. We can't wait for your next stay!

Summary: Great staff. Everyone was friendly and helpful. Room was in excellent shape, clean and fresh. Smaller hotel with lots of dining options near by (walking distance) . Family friendly, yet quiet and peaceful.
Manager Response: Thank you so much! See you again soon.

Summary: The hotel was a very nice hotel the bed was super loud  comfy the only probably we encountered was the fridge not clean and the handle to the bedroom door was broken... it was also burn stains on the foot stools...
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive words! We are so sorry your room was not up to standards; we will ensure this is addressed promptly with our team to rectify for the future. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Family Staycation at Hyatt House Cypress/Anaheim
Summary: Great place for a family staycation.  Grab N Go breakfast bags and fresh coffee made available daily; totally understandable given our current environment, though I miss the old breakfast buffets.  Staff's service was excellent; Covid-19 protocols and signs were clearly in place and being followed.  Would be happy to go back.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that your family staycation with us was wonderful! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Rooms were clean. Place quiet. Protections in place due to Covid. Rooms are comfortable and nice. Showerhead and bathtub is surprisingly luxurious. The grab and go breakfast is very basic. Lots of local restaurants are close by.
Manager Response: Thank you so much - we are so happy you enjoyed your time with us!

Summary: My partner and I planned a last minute getaway trip for the new year! Everything was excellent. From the food options to the attentive service from the staff. We plan on staying here in the future and recommending this hotel to friends and family!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the positive feedback! We can't wait to see you again soon!

Summary: This hotel was by far one of the cleanest hotels I've stayed in. It was very peaceful and the staff was very courteous. The parking was great. Breakfast was just ok just a grab and go option but no hot food
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The Hyatt House is in a prime location when visiting Orange County near Los Alamitos/Cypress/Anaheim.  The area has many attractions including Disneyland just minutes away. And, with the balmy weather and sunsets, it is ideal to visit if you want a beautiful breath of fresh air. The Hyatt House location is also located near a mini Silicon Valley... beautiful corporate buildings line the street near Katella Avenue and great places to eat near by.
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive words, Annie! We are so glad to know that our location was perfect for your needs.

Summary Heading: Great Staff, Nice Rooms, Handled Covid well
Summary: Great Staff, Nice Rooms, Handled Covid well.  We were disappointed they couldn't run the usually great breakfast bar, but they handled it with grab n go breakfast bags.  Also had the heated pool open, and managed capacity.

I have stayed at this hotel multiple times when visiting family and friends from out of state. It is clean and most of the front desk staff are friendly and accommodating. There could be a parking issue as it seems they have long term guests with multiple vehicles or additional visitors for those guests (as I was told by the front desk).

i needed a dog friendly place to stay in my area while work was done on my home. The room was perfect and it was great to have the kitchen area so i could bring some food/supplies from home.  I would recommend this hotel to others.

Comfort, cleanliness and service all that I needed. I was looking an extension of my home and I fond it with this hotel with all things required by all integrands of my family in terms of confort and facilities.

Summary Heading: Great 1 night stay at Hyatt House Cypress/Anaheim
Summary: We stayed for 1 night at the Hyatt House Cypress Anaheim. This was our first time in this property and I was very pleased.    The rooms are very spacious and spotless.  The rooms are very clean in this property.  Very quiet also and we had a good nights rest.  Jessica and Jason were very accommodating and took care of us during our stay.  They made sure we are taken cared of.    We will definitely be back! Highly recommended.

Unfortunately cannot recommend this hotel. The staff simply doesn't understand what customer service is ie; greeting guests, telling where your room is, & making you feel welcome. This was the first time I walked into a hotel and no one said anything. The entrance/lobby was filthy with debris, it was packed (at a time of covid) and the room was disgusting- we couldn't shower, touch anything, and overall felt creeped out. We cut our stay short and booked somewhere else.

I specifically looked for a hotel like this (full kitchen , living room) to fit a family of 5 adults for 3 nights. It was perfect.  Room was on the first floor looking towards the patio/courtyard area??? I should’ve asked for a room upstairs because I like to open the blinds/windows and not see people or have them see me, but that was on me for not asking.   Didn’t take advantage of breakfast. Plenty of parking. We parked in the back and it felt safe.   Would definitely stay again based on 3 good nights sleep, a clean room, friendly staff, and parking (all of which is what I only care for in hotels I stay at).

Stayed here while my apartment was being remodeled.  Great choice.  Very pleased.  Nice staff, clean rooms, and an overall good experience.  I will definitely look for more Hyatt properties when I travel from now on!

What a totally awesome place. It had a full kitchen with pots, pans, silverware, dishes, cups, coffee maker, everything that you need for a little at home experience!!! This was a king suite that had a closed off bedroom area and a sofa bed that let out for additional family members. Due to Covid-19,  we were not able to take advantage of the free breakfast.  Staff was great.  I am a hotel manager and I am highly impressed with this hotel!!!

Summary Heading: Great for extended stay even during this crazy time.
Summary: Great staff. Nice suites. Everything you need is here. Service animal friendly. I did not get to use the amenities due to the pandemic. All amenities were closed. But it was good to see they are following protocol. Very clean. It is a bit more money but well worth it. Stay away from extended stay across the street. Local to plenty of food of all different kinds.

Nice hotel (2 room suites, kitchenettes, very quiet, in business area but shopping and restaurants within 2 blocks)  great breakfast (omelet station & hot eggs/breakfast meats/more) 20 minutes to Disney on surface roads

Great staff that make the stay smooth I would recommend this hotel and I have to family and friends .. the complimentary breakfast is a plus.. I've been staying at hyatt house cypress for 2 yrs a free

This is a great smaller hotel.  Large room, absolutely pristine room & lobby, dining area.  Quiet surroundings in a small corporate area.  Chili's & fresh fish place right next door.  Very friendly staff.  I would highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for choosing Hyatt and for taking the time to share your experience. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our excellent customer service and location to nearby food places. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Excellent apartment style hotel at a convenient location
Summary: Stayed three nights at this hotel.    Jessica at the front desk was very helpful, polite, and understanding.  Thank you!  The room itself was a bit dated, but clean, and of a very good size.  The kitchen was stocked with essentials for cooking or heating up simple meals.    The breakfast area was very busy on the days that we were there!  The breakfast staff were patient and friendly, and replenished items quickly.  There was also an omelet bar.  The hotel is surrounded by business parks.  There are a strip mall, a restaurant, and Wendy's nearby, in walking distance.  There is a Costco and more restaurants in a short driving distance.  The location is very convenient, safe, and quiet.  There is a bar in the kitchen area, open for business in the evenings.  Overall it was an
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for choosing Hyatt and for taking the time to share your experience. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our clean and spacious rooms as well as our complimentary breakfast items and excellent customer service. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Hyatt good as always, perfect location if you are visiting Disney parks. The breakfast is the best. The rooms are perfect, the attention as well. Looking forward to our next vacation time and hope there is a Hyatt near by
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for choosing Hyatt and for taking the time to share your experience. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our clean and spacious rooms as well as our complimentary breakfast items and excellent customer service. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Room 262 is immediately over the lobby and restaurant and next to the elevator. All night long. The lobby door opens and closes and the lobby guests can be heard. Staying in this room is TERRIBLE! In the am, the cooking smells permeate the room. Not sure what hotel employee thought that was the perfect place to put a Hyatt member that specifically requested a quiet room away from the elevator; clearly not the most adept reader of the reservation request.

The room prices near Anaheim were outrageous for the Valentines Day Pre-Weekend Thursday-Friday. World of Hyatt recommended this hotel and since we love Hyatt House, we booked it at a great price. We were blown away by how nice this hotel was and only a 17 minute drive back to Disneyland. (Even closer to Knott's.) We just may prioritize this hotel over those on Harbor Blvd next time we stay overnight for a Disney getaway.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for choosing Hyatt and for taking the time to share your experience. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and our great location to nearby attractions. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Excellent place to stay while being very close to office meetings.  Lots of choices offered for free breakfast.  Hotel staff very professional  from the reception desk to the housekeeping team.  As expected, room was ready at check in time and no issues experienced.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for choosing Hyatt and for taking the time to share your experience. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our clean and spacious rooms as well as our complimentary breakfast items and excellent customer service. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Hyatt House, ordinary Hotel with no cost effective budget. I have been staying in Hyatt group Hotels worlwide for over the last 15 years or so and Hyatt House is part of the brand. Prices for these Hyatt House location are not justyfing the services and level of comfort. Hyatt House or Hyatt Place Hotels are usually $200 night including breakfast and now parking (not always). One indication: please do not ask clients to help with breakfast cleaning in the morning. It is not an Hostel rate location. Location is out of L.A. with decent access to city by car if you know the timing to face Highway. Indicated more for family and nearby Industrial area.

The best sleep on earth. Bar was delightful breakfast in bed rooms are somewhat sound proof. My wife and kids had fun and did not want to leave. We visit this particular hotel because of knotts berry farm.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for choosing Hyatt and for taking the time to share your experience. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our clean and spacious rooms as well as our complimentary breakfast items and great location to nearby attractions. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Great hotel   , services was great and room was clean   Hotel is very close to a lot restaurants and attractions .   I really love staying in this hotel when I travel to Los Angeles ..   Crews are always welcome and happy to help and take care you
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for choosing Hyatt and for taking the time to share your experience. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our clean and spacious rooms as well as our location to other places and excellent customer service. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Got in early, room ready.  Good condition nothing stood out as amazing but it was a good price for what we received.  Coffeemaker outdated but they serve coffee in lobby; would like to see coffee available all day.  Also don’t like the little cheap plastic half and half containers.  Just have cream available in a container like you do milk and juice - save money, less plastic waste, and having to open each one for a cup of coffee!😊
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for choosing Hyatt and for taking the time to share your experience. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our clean and spacious rooms. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a great price

Summary: We booked a king suite for the family.   Spacious, clean, comfortable, and convenient location makes this hotel a great base to visit Disneyland, Knotts Berry and other attractions in Orange County.  Breakfast was good as well.

Summary: This is by far the best place to stay with family/friends. They are accommodating to fit around your requests. They have very clean and spacious rooms, the breakfast is top notch, and they have other amenities such as a bar, lounge area, pool, laundry facilities, and an elevator just to name a few. Staff were all very helpful, pleasant, and there to help you if needed. I have not found such level of professionalism in a hotel stay as I have at Hyatt House Cypress. I hope in the future the prices stay reasonable so we can continue future stays here.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for choosing Hyatt and for taking the time to share your experience. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast items as well as our extra amenities, and exceptional customer service. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I went here for the Disneyland, and it's a great place to stay! It has free parking and free breakfast, which is quite attractive. And I went there quite late at 11:30 pm, still the front desk greeted me very professionally, and gave me a free upgrade of my room! The room is really spacey and clean! Also, the hotel has a pool! I really enjoyed the stay here, and will definitely recommend my friend to stay here!
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for choosing Hyatt and for taking the time to share your experience. Summary: First time stay.  Would definitely return.  Room very clean, fresh and pleasant to look at.  We had a full kitchen in our room, complete with cooking utensils.  Had two T.V.s, one in bedroom and one in living room.

Summary: Second time staying there and service was excellent again. I will be staying there every time I go to my California office for business. The omelette bar is extremely likable and the morning breakfast staff makes sure that everything is fresh.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for choosing Hyatt and for taking the time to share your experience. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our exceptional customer service and variety of food items. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Family of 5 staying in a 2 bedroom queen suite. Carpet was really dirty, our socks and feet were completely black just around the room. Shower was also clogged. It was fine for one night given the price. Room is spacious although we probably won't be back.

We stayed for 2 nights with our daughters and my mom while visiting family in the Cypress area for the Thanksgiving holiday. We chose the hotel based on its proximity to my cousin's home and the amenities offered, especially the kitchen in the room and complimentary breakfast. Overall, the stay was good with comfortable beds, a well equipped kitchen in the room, and a decent breakfast. I took off 1 star because the breakfast ended promptly at 9am, which seemed a bit early to me and because paying almost $200 per night for this room seemed overpriced to me. I have stayed in similar hotels and had an almost identical experience for half the price. Also, I agree with previous reviewers that having coffee available after the breakfast time would be a nice touch.

You walk in and is smells fresh and clean.  The customer services is excellent.  The food quality was great and delicious.  The rooms are very clean and up to date. I would recommend to anyone.  The kitchens are very too.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for choosing Hyatt and for taking the time to share your experience. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our clean and spacious rooms as well as our exceptional customer service and food items. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This hotel is modeled more towards an airport / corporate contract/ family extended stay style hotel hence you get the kitchen but need to rely on more self services.  However it is clean, has nice modern decor with comfortable beds, decent complimentary breakfast and well-trained staffs that meet Hyatt’s high standards.  We stayed for the Thanksgiving week, hotel was busy but staffs were still able to provide excellent services.  Romina at the front desk went extra miles to make sure our stay is extra special.  Definitely will visit again.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for choosing Hyatt and for taking the time to share your experience. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our clean and spacious rooms and exceptional customer service. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Very quiet location and close access to everywhere we needed to be. Staff was friendly and helpful. Hotel was clean. We enjoyed our stay very much and recommend this hotel if you are in the area visiting.

Summary Heading: A+ Stay at Hyatt House Cypress

They also drove us back to the airport the next day. They offer free shuttle in a 5 mile radius as well but didn't get to use it  * We arrived 2 hours before check-in, but a suite was ready for us and we were able to check in right away. Staff very friendly and welcomed me as a Hyatt member * Room 126, ground floor, clean, spacious King Suite w/clean full kitchen (with garbage disposal yay!)  * Kitchen had all the dishes and cookware stocked so you didn't have to call for it and wait like some other hotels  * AC was not on when we entered and the room was warm which made me
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for choosing Hyatt and for taking the time to share your experience. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast items as well as our clean and spacious rooms, and exceptional customer service. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I stayed at this hotel over an extended period for a business trip. The employees are courteous, but there is much to be desired. Cleaning detail varies greatly day-to-day. Sometimes towels will be replenished, others not. I often found hair not belonging to me in the bathroom. I recently discovered a piece of chewed gum on a shower rack that I hadn't noticed before. It's probably been there for my entire stay, but didn't notice due to my poor vision. WiFi reliability was poor after they installed Chromecasts on all the TVs apparently without upgrading their bandwidth. This place might be good for a quick visit to Disneyland, but otherwise wouldn't recommend it.

Very large rooms and great for a family! The breakfast is resort style; loved the omelette bar! The staff is really nice and the lobby was festive and fun! Great apartment/modern style hotel. Our stay was enjoyable!
