Summary Heading: nice clean room and the best breakfast
Summary: the location is perfect for us. very close to Disney. the room are clean and updated. the breakfast was delicious and the staff were great and very helpful the only complain i have are the people who stay there. Some are not polite :)

Stayed five nights, friendly staff and clean rooms. Breakfast one of the highlights with omelet bar each morning. Only downside was very noisy air conditioner unit, We just shut it off at night so we could sleep.

Summary Heading: Great breakfast and nice staff for visiting Disneyland
Summary: Hyatt house Cypress is great place to visit Disneyland with Family. Hot breakfasts were serviced daily from 7am (week day starts at 6:30am). Hotel staffs were great and very helpful during our stay. However, walls and floors are thin and sound insulation needed to be improved to provide guests tranquility during stays. On site parking and WiFi are both included. It's about 6 miles from Disneyland and great place to stay when visiting Micky.

Room was spacious and comfortable. I will be staying again. Felt at home and close to restaurant as Well. Front desk could be a bit nicer, other than that I would recommend this hotel to any of my friends and family.

Stayed at this location every week for over a month. I travel for work and a majority of times stay at Hilton properties. I was pleasantly surprised with the Hyatt House Cypress/Anaheim. 15 minutes away from Long Beach Airport, Staff very friendly, centrally located to nearby restaurants, grocery stores. rooms were clean and the kitchen is perfect for extended stay.   Their breakfast is the best I've experienced with many choices: alternating bacon/sausage, alternating waffles/pancakes/french toast, made to order omelets, fruit, bread, cereal milk and ALMOND MILK.  Definitely will recommend.

This was surprisingly one our better experiences in Southern California.  Hotel is not far from all major attractions.  Hotel staff is extremely friendly, I would highly recommend a stay at this location.

You won't go wrong with this hotel.  Rooms were very big and very clean.  Staff was nice.  Fire pit was a treat!  I found this hotel to be very quiet which was much appreciated.  I didn't use the pool but the area did seem to be kept us.  Balcony was so nice in the warm weather.

One of the worst stays I’ve ever had. It ruined my weekend. My anniversary celebration was completely ruined. I was overcharged over $1000.  I was not even treated as a preferred member or even validated for my concerns.

Easy check in and the cookie was delicious!  Beds were good, nice clean room. No complaints at all. It was perfect for my family vacation.  My daughter lost a bracelet and they let us back in the room to look even though we had checked out a few hours before. Even housekeeping helped us look. Amazing customer service.

Summary Heading: Wish I had a reason to stay longer
Summary: I really enjoyed this hotel. It has a full kitchen and offers a separate bedroom and living space. Free, full breakfast and courteous staff. Clean. Wish I had had a reasom to stay longer and take advantage of other amenities.

Summary Heading: Not the best but not the worst either
Summary: I'd say this is a great hotel for tourist due to the larger room size. I live in the area and was only staying a couple days while work was being done on my home. The hotel is a bit on the older side and could use cleaning/updating. If the hotel was updated to a modern type of look I would totally feel like it's worth the money paid. Just needs a little work

We stayed in San Diego, Cypress and Burbank, out of the three hotels, Hyatt House was the best hotel experience. The rooms were very clean and the location was central. My only small complaint is the pillows.

although this hotel is 6 miles from Disney, it makes up for it by service, quality, condition of rooms.  Disney is only a 6 mile distance, easily $13.00 to $18.00 by uber.  About a 20 min. drive if not in rush hour traffic.  You can spend more time on the ART bus, then 20 mins, plus it is a lot more closer and confortable.  We stayed in a suite, that had a private bedroom, living room, and full kitchen.  The only complaint we had, is the pull out bed mattress was horrible, it was lumpy andcould feel every spring in it.

The Hyatt House in Cypress/Anaheim is a great place to stay!! They have extended stay with kitchens in the rooms with all the necessary equipment to cook your own food. The King suite was very roomy and comfortable with a full American breakfast included everyday. Free WiFi is nice to get work done or just relax with your computer. I will definitely stay here again on my next visit to Southern California.

rooms are very clean and spacious. quiet atmosphere. the food is very good and their breakfast are good. nice bar to relax in the evenings.The parking area is very lit and secure. The employees are friend and attentive.

Summary Heading: Great suite with kitchen and nice buffet breakfast!
Summary: Great suite with kitchen and nice buffet breakfast! It felt like a cozy little apartment, we loved it and would like to stay there again in the future! It was clean and modern and was wonderful! I recommend the hotel!

Newly renovated. Excellent accommodations. Courteous and helpful staff. Conveniently located to beach, shopping and restaurants. Great patio and pool area. Late night cocktails available. Frequent guest for the past 8 years. Never disappointed. Always a pleasant experience.

My room was not ready when I arrived even thought it was after 4pm but I only had to wait a few minutes.  The first night was fine and I liked having a mini refrigerator.  The hallways were quiet.  The second night I thought I smelled smoke in the non smoking hotel.  I was exhausted and the next morning the smoke was obvious.  I told the desk clerk and he said "I'm sorry".  I checked out early and left early because of the smoke smell and told her that people have respiratory issues and he should check the room.  He said he would.  Breakfast appeared decent but I was irritated and grab a banana and left early. I could smell the smoke in my clothes.  People violate rules like no smoking but I was very disappointed with the desk  clerk's lack of concern and response to me the

All in all, my whole experience at this Hyatt house was very good. Great staff and wonderful service. The room was very clean and their morning breakfast was great. I would definitely come back to this hotel the next time I'm in town.

Love this hotel - the front desk staff were super friendly and helpful.  I was given a free update in my room which was such a special treat!  The included breakfast in the morning was superb and there was so much offered!

I wish there were more of these hotels throughout our journey on I-40 East!! The staff was very accommodating, kind , large rooms , clean and welcomed our pets. Breakfast was awesome! Custom made omelettes!

Better than average Hyatt House.  Breakfast better than any Hyatt House I have stayed in throughout the United States and I have stayed at more than I can count.  Great staff and quiet property and great location

Summary Heading: Always a pleasure to stay at Hyatt House Cypress, CA
Summary: This has become our go to place to stay to visit family.  The staff is always kind, helpful with good suggestions, breakfast has a good variety and the shuttle is a bonus.  Good restaurants are across the street are convenience.

Close proximity to our office in Cypress predetermined my choice of this hotel.  What I experienced were: Large rooms, good gym and delicious breakfast. The staff was quite friendly while the WiFi was fast enough. Would definitely stay here again.

The hotel changed our key card with out notifying me. This put my pregnant girlfriend in a tough position because we couldnt use the restroom when we got back, we had to use our friends hotel while i went to get our key card handled. I called the front desk & Natasha said i had to come down to the front desk because she was by her self, which was a lie. She was careless and slow & did not understand the state of urgency we were in. When we got back inside our hotel. There was a notice on our floor stating the time when they were changing the locks, i left that hotel around 9am that morning..an earlier notice or an email would have been great. Later i saw the trash on our counter left behind by the handy-man who did our room locks

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for Families Visiting Disneyland
Summary: We traveled to attend the annual Mickey Not So Scary Halloween party and this was the perfect location for 4 families to stay.  Each room is setup with a kitchenette which came in handy for storing and reheating leftovers and also keeping drinks cold that we were taking the park and beach.  There is hot breakfast served every morning with a rotating menu and the location also has a grilling area so if you are staying a few days, this a great option to grill and enjoy an outdoor meal with friends or family. The pool area was the perfect size for our 7 and 8 years to play in (the pool goes from 3 1/2 feet to 5 feet deep).  The location is close enough to stores to pick up any needed food and drinks and there are also restaurants within both walking and driving distance.  We plan

I had a great experience with this hotel. I loved the kitchens in the rooms. I felt like I was in my own apartment. I loved how each day  was a direct experience for breakfast. I got to choose my own ingredients for my morning omelet. I would definitely come back.

Summary Heading: First Time Here - it was great!
Summary: First time at the Hyatt House. The grounds, room & hotel were clean. The staff was very pleasant & accommodating, always greeting. Bar/Restaurant was clean, breakfast was delicious, with various choices.

We stayed at this property for 3 nights just recently and didn't regret it. We had a suite room. We loved the kitchen with those plates, pots, etc. the room was big so you have enough space to open up your luggage. It was indeed an amazing stay and we would love to come back if we would be in the area.The property is well- maintained. Breakfast was really good too!

Summary Heading: Bring your own fly trap and don’t leave stuff behind.
Summary: None of the windows have screens and would find a large amount of flies and mosquitos in the room daily. Don’t leave anything behind nobody will know where it is. If you are staying long term bring your own fly and mosquito traps.

Summary Heading: Couldn't have been better! Great staff, great hotel, great location!
Summary: I was there for extended stay, about 30 days and had the best experience! Everything was excellent! I'm definitely coming back to this hotel. Staff, food, drinks, rooms, pool, computers...everything was above expectations.

Second stay here but with family this time. Everybody enjoyed their stay at Hyatt house. "Feels like home" said the kids. Large bedroom with TV separated, with a sofa bed in the separated lounge area (with a second TV), complete with large dining area and a large fridge, and a well-equipped kitchen with cookware and dishes. Parking is free. There are laundry rooms for longer stay. Compared to the hotel we were in just the day before, it was quiet at Hyatt, felt so relaxing. 10mn far from Disneyland, 5mn far from Knott's Berry Farm. Lots of shops just around the corner. Good restaurants and fast food at less than 5mn. Oh yeah the breakfast buffet with sweet fresh fruits, different kind of bread, cereals, omelet bar, waffles, pancakes or french toast, rice, miso soup and so much

We experienced a flood from a broken water heater on the second floor of our home. This requires us to abruptly find a place to stay for the night. Enter the Cypress/Anaheim Hyatt House property! They were just what was needed during that time. In a word  the total experience was OUTSTANDING!!!

The hotel was very clean, kind & courteous. Room service was a dream. Parking is located on the site in which I was able to park pretty much at my room door. Check in & check out was a breeze. They have an amazing breakfast setup every morning from building your own omelet to eggs bacon & grits. The restaurant located within the hotel was amazing.

The rooms are so spacious and the bed was amazing, so great for our wedding weekend, the breakfast is wonderful (best scrambled eggs and bfast potatoes) --including all the seating options for breakfgast -- and the complimentary shuttle is very, very helpful.

The hotel is situated within a business area. Costco is about 1 mile away which was good for getting gas. Area is next to Anaheim, Fulton, and Garden Cove.  The hotel suite layout is very nice - living area with full kitchen and separate sleeping area with bathroom.  The breakfast is very disappointing - cereal, fruit, coffee, and omelette station (very small with long line).  The staff was somewhat off and was disappointed in them. I had to repeat my request several times in person before they understood what I was asking - when I forgot my key in the room, when the room key was not working, and when I needed a copy of my bill. I don't have any accent or anything but they all were not attentive- like they had taken too much Benadryl.  This hotel allowed pets.  Several times we

Summary Heading: quiet location with spacious room, perfect for extended stay
Summary: + spacious room with separate living room and sleeping room, plus balcony. Nice Sofa, TV in living room and sleeping room. + quiet Location + good breakfast buffett, nice Patio to have breakfast also outside. + perfect for an Extended stay

We stayed 10 days for family reunion the hotel is excellent  very helpful staff theone  ibedroom suite is very well planned very healthy and complete breakfast it is a true suite would strongly recommend hotel and staythere next year

They turned in my info to police claiming that I was on parole. I have never been to jail much less prison! They seemed to enjoy humiliating me on my daughter's birthday. I always thought this was an ok hotel but no!

stood one night and it really left a mark. perfect hotel hard long search but i was happy with the turnout good location, has everything you could need for a stay away from home definitely going back very good for the price too!

I'm very satisfied that we chose this hotel. It was close to all the family we were visiting. The staff was very helpful and polite, and friendly. The available morning breakfast really good, with so much variety and really good options to choose from. The room is clean and you get all the necessities in a small kitchen for a family trip. WiFi was great and fast enough. Free Parking a big plus. I would and I will stay again at this hotel when I need to travel to the area again.

This is my regular staying place when I am in Southern California: Al GM Is great so as his team, they have one of the best breakfast including freshly made omelette. Al is also and only GM hands on manager serving during breakfast time ! I was impressed! Only complaint I had was very noise on Saturday night around midnight and they eventually fixed. Other then that, our stay was flawless and great. I already booked on my next trip in November!

We have stayed at this Hyatt every year to visit family in the area. We have considered it a home away from home. Great amenities, immaculate rooms and good location. The entire staff is friendly and helpful. We will definitely be returning on our next vacation.

It was a great experience staying with HYATT for around 5 months. The hospitality, food and maintenance, everything is up to the mark! I would definitely recommend Hyatt if you are looking for some quality for the money spent.

This place is actually a hidden jem. Absolutely one of the best places i have stayed at in Los Alamitos. If modern is your thing, this is the place for you! Everything was updated no bologna being served here.! This place is legit fully recommend, and the reason for a 4 star is there really isn't much around and you will need to travel for any amusement parks.... they do offer shuttle though!!!!! Total selling point this is the place you want to be! Did i mention the huge room? I loved it!

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay, close to Anaheim & Long Beach
Summary: I stayed here for 5 nights. It is a decent place. I would recommend this place. The room is clean. The hotel premises is secure. The breakfast is decent, except that it's crowded during peak time. The front desk staff is friendly. There are restaurants within a few minutes' walk.

My husband had a staycation here at the Hyatt House in Cypress. We have a special needs daughter that we can't be too far from in case of an emergency but was a perfect get away for our anniversary. It was tucked away inside a  business area where there were restaurants all around. My first thought was that it was a little misplaced because of all the businesses around it but when we got inside it was nicely decorated, a bit small but quiet and peaceful considering the surrounding area.  Quite small in the waiting area where we checked in but nice just the same. Customer service was excellent and very helpful and even let us choose what floor we'd prefer. *And the eating dining area was small but did its purpose and they had quite a breakfast that was FREE with even specialty

Just had a great time here.  All the employee were just great, always with a smile, and can they do anything for you.  A very clean hotel.  Great location to many eating establishments all within 1 block going each way.  If you want, rooms had a full kitchen to cook in with utensils and pots and pans provided.  Supermarket 2 blocks away.  Breakfast was great with a selection that will please anyone.  Shuttle to places within 5 miles radius. I'm already planning to come back!  You need to stay here!

We really enjoyed our room-the King Suite-it was like a really nice little apartment, the only thing I would change is the mattress. We liked the room so much though, we would just bring a memory foam topper next time.

Excellent location, very clean, extremely friendly staff,  The manager Andreas, and I hope I'm spelling his name correctly, but anyway he was so very  attentive, and and helpful, he made everything so easy.  So thank you and your staff.

We stayed at this property as part of a travelling baseball team. the hotel was great, excellent service and facilities. would highly recommend. Rooms are in great shape, complimentary breakfast is very good especially for families. They have a small business center which is great for team admin duties.

Great place to stay.  There are a lot of nearby places to eat and shop at.  I really liked that there was a full kitchen with everything you would need to cook and dine with.  Free parking is always great.  The new remodel has a great openness to it that is pleasantly inviting.  Even the modest decor was a great touch.  The staff were all very nice.

Summary Heading: This place runs circles around Marriott and other runners up
Summary: This was our 60th business trip to the OC and all of them at this hotel. Why? Because hands down, you cannot surpass Hyatt's level of excellence and go-the-extra-mile guest care or level of training of all staff, from front desk to housekeeping ... A plus.  The general manager has Four Seasons aiming high thinking.  Can't beat the value, either.

Very well maintained property inside and out. pool area was very inviting to relax by the fire pit. continental breakfast was a big plus as is the free shuttle to get me to my meeting. would stay here again with out a doubt!

The staff was friendly and helpful.  They respond immediately to inquiries and requests.  The cleaning lady was very efficient.  The food staff was friendly also.  The food was well prepared.  Good mix of breakfast choices.  There was even an omelet station.  Would stay here again.

Clean and well-apportioned room (king suite), full (not just "continental") breakfast included with omelet bar, choice of breads and cereals including steel-cut oatmeal and alternating waffles and pancakes, plus plain scrambled eggs with either bacon or sausage and potatoes. Absolutely worth staying here and getting up early-ish on vacation for.

Great place to stay for Los Angeles and Disney. Great staff and great breakfast to start the day.  Stayed in a king st and was perfect for family of four.  Was able to borrow utensils to grill in the commons area.

The early check out policy is not clear.  I was told one thing when I checked in, but when I informed the front desk the next morning that I was to check out early they said they would have to charge me.  I was told to "read the sign" posted at the front desk.  I did, and I was within the time frame that was written - before noon 24 hrs prior to check out.  When I explained this to the clerk I was told that meant 24 hours from the date you want to check out, not your original check out date.  The sign does not clarify that at all. I was charged for the additional day, which guarantees I will never stay at that hotel again.  And as a business person who stays in hotels on average a dozen nights a month, equates to lost revenue for them.  I hope that one night charge was worth it.

Good area, friendly staff, many restaurants nearby, easy to park, small but ok pool incl towels, great to offer barbecue by yourself - overall a great place for a little longer (7-14 days) family stay for activities throughout LA area

Summary Heading: Nice, modern place, with VERY noisy guest above us...
Summary: We stayed in the king suite.  Everything is very up to date and clean. The kitchenette was perfect for us.  There is no stove, but it has everything else.  The bed was VERY firm.  The breakfast area is somewhat small and cramped when in full swing.  While there is a nice variety of food, even fresh "made to order" omelettes, the seating is small for the number people trying to cycle through there.  The hotel has a shuttle service, that will provide transportation to and from the close amusement parks.  Make sure and set up a reservation for both morning and evening, or you might be out of luck.  We were given bad information by the front desk.  When I set up our morning ride I was told to call when we were ready to get picked up and they would come and get us.  When I called I

It's was a good stay, hotel is in the safe area, they have awesome breakfast and rooms are very comfortable. Only 15 to 20 minutes from Disney land. Their service is also good, they have heated swimming pool and hot tub!!!

The staff was amazingly helpful and even checked with us before we arrived to see if we needed anything. The breakfast was wonderful, with a great variety of things for the whole family. Loved the omelet bar!

It has been years since we returned to the Seal Beach area of Southern California.  This was a much needed visit, and the hotel was within distance of everywhere we wanted to go in the Seal Beach/Long Beach area; including very close to Disneyland.  The  hotel was WONDERFUL and the staff pleasant.  We were pleasantly surprised with the small kitchenette and the stocking of everything we needed from dishes, pots, utensils, etc.  I wish we could have stayed longer!

I am in this area several times/year and was looking for a quieter spot away from the hustle/bustle of Disney.   Loved this hotel - great staff, clean, quiet.   Nice little bar area and patio.....restaurants in easy walking distance.    Great for business travel.

Staff ok, breakfest limited, rooms ok and location ok.  So overall, it's just ok.  Don't expect too much.  Out of all the Hyatt's I've stayed at this one is below par.  The room wasn't ready when I arrived after 4PM and they clearly state the check in is after 3PM.  So it just started out bad.

We have never stayed at a Hyatt before, but we definitely will stay again! The room was clean and in excellent condition. Because we were Hyatt members we were given a free upgrade to a suite which was a pleasant surprise. The breakfast was excellent with an omelette bar and other hot items and a wide variety of choices.

Summary Heading: Not a professional or curtiuos staff
Summary: I was visiting my son on his 23rd birthday , however, the room was too smal , lack space and no veiw . It was a desaster . The front desk lady was cold ,  Unfriendly, and disregard to my family needs  She said that the hotel was 100% occupied, which in opion is not true and there was no manager on duty with 100% occupancy!!! It's unheard of

Very clean and recently updated hotel.  This was my fifth visit for a business stay and enjoyed the accommodations as before.  Rooms are clean and quiet.  The staff is friendly and outstanding.  The free breakfast buffet is laid out for fast and easy access with a variety of items.  A great stay!

Great hotel - very clean Free Wi-Fi Free awesome breakfast Very accommodating Bathrooms nice & clean Happy hour amenities Nice front desk agents and lots of sitting areas for working on computer, eating, etc

This hotel is an excellent option. Close to good restaurants and attractions. Very clean and quiet. The staffing is fantastic. Great experience for long stay (I used this hotel for long stay of over 250 days).

What great suites! A very warm welcome from reception. We loved these apartment style rooms with fully equipped kitchen and full size fridge/freezer., seating area and separate bedroom. Serviced each day they are spotless, and have everything provided from coffee to toiletries. Laundry facilities are on two floors also. These would be perfect for families or couples doing the parks that want a "home" base rather than hotel room, though we didn't do the parks the drive to LA city and surrounds is close enough to drive each day. The area is safe, clean and more suburban than tourist. Fabulous breakfast with a chef on hand and the evening meals were delicious yet very reasonable. Highly recommend.

Summary Heading: Nice clean place with a nice breakfast
Summary: We were in this hotel less than 12 hours, but it was very nice. Checked in after a long day at Disneyland, and the room was very clean and spacious. The bathroom was huge, and there was a nice shower.   The breakfast was better than any free breakfast I have had at a hotel (there was an omelet bar!), and it left a very good impression of the Hyatt House chain in my mind.

This is a great place for singles and families. It is a clean facility and you feel safe staying at this location in Cypress CA. The staff is attentive and very professional. A great visit to Southern Cal. Thank you Hyatt House

Clean,Quality, excellent customer service! Smoke free,pool fire pit banquet rooms good food yummy full free breakfast suites with full kitchen have all amenities of home,any other items need you can borrow!  Also free internet!

Hotel was excellent. So many amenities for the price. Service was great. Nice outdoor area. Complimentary breakfast was really good. Rooms were spacious and comfortable. Will be back here if in the area again.

Exactly how described. Friendly staff. Quiet location. Spacious rooms. Free parking. Amazing complimentary breakfast with different options, even lots of healthy ones. Definitely would stay again. Thanks!

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay with my family
Summary: LOVED this hotel and the set up of the room. So clean! Loved having the full fridge and kitchen. We will be staying again. Also the staff was beyond accommodating and very friendly. The kids had a blast in the pool and we loved the out door bbq's

It was an awesome experience! I love that there's a small kitchen, so we can prepare our meal anytime.  The location is very accessible, very close to shops and nice restaurants. Nice and comfortable room! I'm satisfied with my stay. The free breakfast is a plus...

Summary Heading: Great place to stay very family friendly.
Summary: We plans a overnight trip and had such a great stay we will be booking a week very soon. The breakfast was great and my children loved it as well. They are also pet friendly and to some this may be a plus.

Thank you Hyatt House for a memorable experience. During our stay we received the utmost service. Which allowed my family to spend our time, having quality time. The lobby, our room, pool area, dining area, and grounds we're kept immaculately all three days of our stay, both on weekdays and weekends. Every emeninty was within reach. Every staff member was approachable, welcoming, friendly, reliable, and knowledgeable at they're position. The entire hotel was modern and clean. I will look forward to staying at Hyatt House in the future.

Located near several dining options.  Very clean hotel.  Great staff.  Staff was friendly and professional.  Breakfast was great.  There were several options including many cereal options, lots of drink options including many different milk choices..  The omelet bar was very good,

Complimentary breakfast is amazing. Build your own omelet, on top of everything else!  Bar specials until 8pm. Did not have a chance to use but a very nice fire pit and heated pool area just off of the breakfast/bar area. Could not have been a nicer stay. Great staff!!

Suite was excellent! Clean and modern. Perfect for us and two small kids. Defintely would recommend. Breakfast included was excellent and staff was friendly. Place is away from the hustle and bustle yet close to major attractions.

Summary Heading: Quiet hotel with a great breakfast.
Summary: This is an modern, quiet hotel in a nice neighborhood.  Better than average breakfast.  We arrived late (after midnight) but there was a friendly, helpful face at the front desk ready to answer any question.  We were able to check in and out on-line with ease.  The hotel was quiet and our room was very quiet with no hallway or outside noise which is a must for me.  We were pleasantly surprised to see all the options for breakfast including a omelette bar and all and hot and cold options.  I was impressed and definitely would stay again if I was in the area.

Great for the money, staff was amazing, breakfast was excellent at Cypress Hyatt House. Although, we wished we stayed at the Disneyland Hyatt House, because it was so much better looking, up to date, fancier, and cleaner than cypress.

This hotel worked out great for our family of 4 (twin toddlers) - everyone was so nice.  The kids enjoyed their first swim experience in the hot tub which was clean and cozy.  Breakfast omelettes were really good (the line is long for a reason).  Parking was plentiful, although you may not get a spot directly in front of your entrance.  You can walk to sushi, Thai, a fish place, Chinese, fastfood (I wanted to try the hotel apps/small plates but never got a chance).  Staff was so friendly.  Only thing that would make this place better would be to replace carpet with more sustainable flooring, as I can see it getting musty over time, but we personally had no issues.  All facilities were clean to our liking.  If we ever return to Southern California/Orange County, I see no reason

Great hotel and great breakfast!  We stayed here during spring break (April 17 - April 22 of 2017).  My husband and two kids were comfortable and enjoyed the stay.  Our room was a double queen with a pullout queen sofa with a kitchen, so we had plenty of room.  The living area of the room was spacious but if the sofa bed was pulled out, the only place to sit was at the island's two barstool chairs, consequently, there was no dining table.  We were fine with this.  The kitchen had a fullsize refrigerator, full size stove, fullsize dishwasher and garbage disposal along with a smaller sized microwave.   The bathroom was large and the powder area was adequate.  There is no grip on the bathtub floor, but there is a grip-bar attached to the wall.  The carpet, bathroom tile and faux

The room was very clean, and super quiet. Staff attentive and helpful. This hotel has all the amenities, and it is close to everything - restaurants, freeways, attractions.  I would definitely stay here again

My overall experience was Very Good. The lobby and hallways were well done and clean. The room was a bit small but well done, as expected from HyHouse. The breakfast was excellent, also as expected from HyHouse

We were blown away by our stay at your property! Southern California traffic is another matter… But as far as the property itself, the hot tub, the breakfast omelettes, and staff politeness… We had zero  problems, issues, complaints and plan on staying here every time we visit Southern California.  Hate to let the secret out as it feels like a bargain gem, but also feel it deserves recognition. Great for families/kids.

Wonderful stay. The hotel, and staff were wonderful. The breakfast was amazing, as well as the security you feel at this hotel. It also helped to have multiple restaurantsources near by for when you do not want to go to far.

Traveling with a large family it can be hard to find a hotel that can fit us all.  The Hyatt house did not disappoint there was plenty of room, lots of parking, nice pool and a great morning breakfast, with enough options to feed us all, plus the omelettes were a huge hit. The location was a plus for us as well, being 15 minutes away from Disney meant less of the  tourist feel, and more enjoyable vacation.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel a reasonable price
Summary: The Hyatt House was comfortable and clean. the breakfast was very good - plenty of food and good variety. there were custom omelets and waffles as well as typical fare. I used the exercise room and it was also clean and well maintained with several tread mills, an elliptical machine, and a bike for aerobic exercise as well as a weight machine and free weights. The hotel is conveniently close to several restaurants also.

Hotel staff very friendly and welcoming.  Room felt like we were staying in a condo rather than a hotel room.  Very nice and updated appliances and furniture.  Easy fast drive to Disneyland will lots up food options driving up Katella.  Will definitely plan another stay at this hotel.

will go back there; staff extremely helpful and friendly; suite was very comfortable with daily housekeeping; breakfast was an added amnenity with a wonderful selection and omellettes made to order was an added bonus; it  is in close proximity to everything including Disney

I have stayed in many hotels, and a building is a building. However, you will find a dedicated group of people working here, and that is what carries this hotel way above it's contemporaries. From the excellent service; metal eating utensils; comfortable pillows; you cannot  find better.

Easy driving distance to Disneyland, Universal studios, Hollywood and beaches. Very clean lovely staff and great room. The hotel has coffee in the room but no complimentary tea or coffee elsewhere in the hotel.

my kids and hubby would like to go back and stay at the hotel again. everything was accessible for us. bed was alright. wish it had more cushioning. no complains. close to Costco, restaurants, Porto's Bakery, Knotts Berry Farm.

Family Reunion, Disneyland and California Adventure. All 26 stayed at this hotel which is modern, beautiful and clean. Our room included a kitchen and was very spacious. The breakfast included was the best I've ever had at a hotel; even had a made-to-order omelet station. The breakfast staff were cheerful and kept all food and drinks well stocked. The pool and hot tub are nice and well kept. Housekeeping did a great job keeping our room refreshed and clean. The front desk staff were very friendly and helpful. I would definitely stay again and recommend to others.

Summary Heading: Healthy Breakfast, Clean and Comfy Accommodations
Summary: Healthy & vegan breakfast options (several fruit and seed options with oatmeal, miso soup in constituent parts, cold almond milk for tea and coffee).   Some environmentally friendly(ier) practices.  Cleaner and more functional bathroom than I see at comparable hotels.    Softer comfortable mattress with abundance of pillows.  My roomed face a Chili's across the street, but I did not hear any disruptive noises at night, nor did I feel that there were crowds who could see into my room.  (I could smell when they started cooking in the morning if I opened my balcony door).

Comfortable hotel.   Clean and spacious.  Close to Disneyland.  Lots of Food options near hotel.  Friendly staff.  Free parking Overall we should stay here again.  Easy drive to Disneyland and knotts berry farm.  Comfortable bed. Our only complaint is that they were a bit stingy with shampoo and conditioner.

Amazing hotel! The suites were larger than I expected. Full kitchen a plus and beautiful. It was a little further from Disneyland than expected but free parking made up for that. Breakfast was on point. Wasn't expecting to havr cook to order omletes so that was a plus. Can't wait for our next trip in July. Going to take advantage of the pool and BBQ's on our next stay.

We were cordially greeted upon our arrival by the desk clerk. He told us upon check that complimentary transportation was available to destinations within 5 miles of the Hotel. We were instructed to just come to the front desk if we needed a ride. We were glad to hear this service was available as we did not have a vehicle.   We stayed in a Standard King room.  The bed was comfortable. The room lighting left a bit to be desired. The bedside table lights were bright and could not be dimmed making it impossible to do any night reading without disturbing my spouse. The room entry area was very small and with the closet and bathroom also in the same area, the area was crowded and hard to navigate even with just two average size people. Otherwise the accommodations were acceptable as

We love the Hyatt house! We once stayed at the westin and it was the worst experience we've ever had! We stay only at Hyatt house when we travel now! We went to disneyland and stayed at Hyatt house cypress! Was absolutely perfect for family vacation!

Have stayed several times at this hotel. The service is always great. Breakfast is standard breKfast Buffett. Omelett bar is great. Gets a little back logged if you do not come early. Rooms are clean and nice.  Location is great.

We have stayed at this location twice. Each time we had wonderful experience with staff and property. My son Enjoyed the pool, we BBQ'd and had plenty of room for the 5 of us. We would have stayed longer than the week, but they were sold out. My family wants to go back.
Manager Response: While we would have loved to accommodate your family for a longer stay, we apologize that our availability did not allow.  We hope that you will visit us again soon for another enjoyable family vacation!

Summary: Visit hotel monthly for business  Staff remembers my preferences  And makes sure I get a great room ! Early breakfast is very consistent and addition of omelette bar is s nice touch  Will continue to stay for business for sure
Manager Response: We are ecstatic that we have become a home away from home for your business travels!  Thank you so much for your loyalty, and we look forward to having you back!

Summary: Wonderful hotel with very friendly staff. Location was central to where I wanted to visit . Close to Disneyland and OC cities for great food and adventures !  My friends and I Ubered to downtown Fullerton, we also visited Anaheim packing district. Huntington  beach is closeby as well as Irvine spectrum, south coast mall.  I love my suite. There was a king bed, spacious bathroom and sink area. There was a kitchen in my suite but we didn't cook anything. Utensils, cups, plates available to use. Very large fridge for food and drinks! Living room had a dining table, couch with pull out bed and flat screen tv! Btw, an additional tv in the bedroom! I would definitely come back and stay here at this location!
Manager Response: It looks like you visited some of the best attractions in Orange County!  We are honored that we could be part of your adventure and hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: My family and I stayed for 6 days. The room was huge and clean. The bathroom was very spacious. It's adequate for a family of 4. Would definitely recommend especially if you wish to visit Disney as it's about 15 mins from the two Disney parks.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for including us in your visit to the "Happiest Place on Earth"!  We are glad that you and your family enjoyed your stay and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: It is a nice hotel, with a small kitchen-cum-living room, bedroom and good bathroom.  The real highlight is the breakfast, with live omlette counter.  However, it gets really crowded later in the morning, so best bet is to go early.   The staff was polite and cooperative.  Service in the breakfast room was good,   The wifi was okay, but for some reason I could not get my laptop onto the network.  Smartphone and tablet worked just fine.  I even spent 30 min with the tech support trying to resolve the problem, but finally I gave up.   The parking is adequate, you may struggle to find a spot on the weekends, though.
Manager Response: We are so sorry that you experienced issues with the WiFi during your stay.  With a newly updated system and the number of business travelers that stay with us, a reliable WiFi signal is the least that can be expected.  We will follow up with our provider to ensure that this is corrected and appreciate your feedback.  Thank you for staying with us and we hope that you will give us another opportunity to earn your loyalty in the future.

Summary: I stay at this hotel at least once a month for several days.  It is clean, the staff is amazing and they will always go out of their way to find you a room, and if nothing is available an alternate option...and even drive you!  The food is very good.  Basic but hits the spot.  Breakfast options are varied and everything is always fresh.  The rooms are very clean and have balconies so those of us insomniacs have a place to enjoy the beautiful weather.  Highly recommend the Hyatt House in Cypress!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation!  We are so glad that the team has consistently been able to show you what customer service means to us.  We greatly appreciate your loyalty and look forward to having you back!

Summary: Nice hotel (with small suites) with a kitchen and a small living room in every room. Spacious bathroom too. Breakfast included in the rate. My room was very noisy: I could hear noise from outside (cars), very loud noise from the hallway and stomping from the room above. Did not get much sleep.
Manager Response: We are terribly sorry that this was your experience with us and we greatly appreciate your feedback.  Please know that your World of Hyatt account has been updated to indicate the best room location for your next stay to ensure that you do not experience these issues moving forward.  Thank you for staying with us and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: I've stayed at a lot of Hyatt's but never a Hyatt House. Love the suites- lots of room and comfortable. Breakfast was great with omelets to order. Staff was friendly and helpful. Definitely will consider this another time.
Manager Response: Thank you for trying out our brand!  We are so glad that you enjoyed your visit and we hope you will return soon!

Summary Heading: Great staff, large rooms, cheap renovation
Summary: Every staff interaction for 3 days was top notch!  The free breakfast is one of the best, but it is a zoo after 9am on the weekends.  The guest room was was a good size. The furniture was nice. The shower was nice and modern (but NO bathtub). The kitchen and large counter top was nice.   The overall impression of the renovation improvements however made me feel like this was a cheap veneer of a Hyatt House over an old motel. Paint was peeling/chipping off the walls. The dressers were already worn. The carpet felt lumpy. The closet door was really old. The window treatments were old and very awkward to use (strange pully system).   The worst part was that the windows were all original single pane and kept very little noise out. Ask for a room facing the courtyard!  All the doors
Manager Response: We are so sorry to see that your stay was anything short of exceptional.  We greatly appreciate your feedback and kind recognition of our wonderful team and hope that you will give us another chance to earn your loyalty in the future.

Summary Heading: Modern, warm and welcoming space 1 Bedroom
Summary: 1 Bedroom space was really perfect for work and lounging.  It's warm and welcoming.  It has the convenience of a "small" apartment.  It's situated close to several restaurants, markets and supply places.
Manager Response: We are so pleased that we could offer all the convenience of home during your stay with us.  Thank you for staying with us and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: The king suite offered a comfortable stay. The kitchen was an added plus!! We wish we had been there longer to enjoy it more. Check-in was super easy, and the staff was friendly. Breakfast was the BEST!! They served cage-free eggs, which was an added bonus since we only eat cage-free/organic at home! The omelette station served made-to-order omelettes, and they were very tasty!! We will stay here anytime we are in the area!!
Manager Response: We are so glad that your experience was comfortable and enjoyable and that our breakfast options aligned well with your family's dietary needs!  Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The staff was friendly and accommodating.  They were present at the desk 24 hours a day.  My two concerns were addressed immediately.  Good hot breakfast with lots of variety. Keep up the great work. Keep up the great work.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback!  We sincerely apologize that there were any concerns that needed to be addressed, but we are glad that they were taken care of promptly.  Thank you for staying with us and we hope that you will visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: A lot nicer within than the generic look on the outside
Summary: This Hyatt has been recently renovated, and while it is still a hotel on a mid-price level, the look of the (extended-stay, kitchenette) rooms is well above the norm.  It's super clean, quiet, efficient, the front desk staff is excellent, and the rooms have a classic designer minimalism that you don't usually find in hotel like this. I stayed for one night because I had to be in Cypress at 4:00 AM the next morning, but I liked it enough that it will be my go-to hotel in this neck of the woods going forward. Great place. Recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation!  We are so glad that we could leave such a great impression in such a short stay and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Rooms and bathroom were clean and spacious.  Location was close to restaurants and a short drive from Disney.  The hotel provides complimentary breakfast which was not bad at all.  The only downside was one employee was so rude that he ruined my experience.  Otherwise it was a good trip except for this one bad seed.
Manager Response: Dear ShineLV, Please accept our sincerest apologies for this experience that put a damper on your entire trip.  This is extremely disappointing to see and this is certainly not how we want you to feel when you interact with our staff.  I will be contacting you directly to discuss the matter further.  It is great that you otherwise enjoyed your visit and we truly hope that you will give us another opportunity to show you the level of service on which we pride ourselves.

Summary: We had the one bedroom suite with view to pool , full kitchen and balcony , it's included breakfast , a bit crowded some mornings there , but think their layout was a bit odd . Nice and friendly staff , and there is a great restaurant next door , where we ate two evenings . Easy access to Disneyland and shopping on malls and outlets and roads , but You need a car to stay here if Disneyland or other places is Your goal, but a good base for the area. We will stay here again if in area .
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: Food was good, service is terrible
Summary: Our visit was very short...we came to our room about 10 pm and were going to Disneyland the following day.  The walls are so thin, we were able to hear all the other guests walking and talking outside our room as well as doors slamming shut. The server at the breakfast bar was extremely rude and must've been having a terrible day.  When I asked him for ketchup, he mentioned they were at the table.  I told him i was sitting outside the main breakfast area (not enough tables) and there were none on our table.....he reached over this older woman and grabbed the ketchup off her table and slammed it in my hand and walked away.  I apologized to the lady and told her that I didn't mean to have the ketchup taken off her table. We were both astonished that there are very rude people in
Manager Response: I will be reaching out to you directly to discuss this matter further, as this situation is quite alarming.  Of the many aspects of a guest’s experience that may be out of the hotel’s control, our customer service is certainly not one of them.  Please know that the level of service you experienced does not reflect our standards and I can assure you that this is a unique experience at our property.  I know that you mentioned you would not chance coming back, but I truly hope that you will give us another opportunity in the future to provide you with a better experience at the Hyatt House Cypress.

Summary: room had a very fishy smell and nothing was done about it over all the room was great as always sink just stunk very bad it would be greatly appreciated if i could get my room free or a free stay at the hotel

Bad wifi signals. Not much options in breakfast. Sound from ceiling floor for every small activity. Isolated location.  Staff is good, well mannered, supportive, always ready to help. Cleaning is good.
Manager Response: I am so disappointed to see that the WIFI was not working properly for you, considering we did an entire system update just before the first of the year.  We will be sure to check on this and appreciate you bringing it to our attention.  As far as our location, we tend to appreciate that we are tucked away from the busy main streets of Orange County.  With minimal street noise and close proximity to Disney, Knott’s Berry Farm and a number of local businesses and restaurants, we offer a bit of a getaway from the hustle and bustle surrounding most other hotels in the area.  I sincerely apologize that we were not quite what you were looking for, but we greatly appreciate your kind recognition of our wonderful team and hope that you will consider staying with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: Just average with a couple issues.
Summary: Left over beer in fridge from guest before me. Long hairs on clean towels. Bed was comfy but tv in bedroom in awful spot you couldn't enjoy watching tv from your bed. Lights in elevator were broken as well.
Manager Response: Dear 691joelr, I am terribly sorry that this was your first impression of our hotel!  Feedback such as yours allows us to improve our service and property, and we greatly appreciate you bringing these matters to our attention.  Please know that we take great pride in the appearance and condition of our property and we sincerely hope that you will give us another opportunity in the future to earn your loyalty.

Summary: Very nice hotel with everything neat and clean. Because of the small kitchens in the rooms, a strong smell of curry type food filled the hallways. Pretty unpleasant. No trace of the smells in the room however. Great and Friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback!  We do offer full kitchens in almost 90 percent of our rooms, so it is not unusual to catch the occasional whiff of someone else’s meal while walking through the hallway, but I am so glad that your room did not give any indication of this.  Thank you for staying with us and we hope that you will visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Hyatt House Cypress - Law New Years 2017
Summary: This is a great hotel with a kitchen and living room.  On check-in, we requested a higher floor and was granted and on top, a room facing the courtyard.  It has a swimming pool and numerous elevators to go upstairs to the 3rd floor.  The breakfast was very good with scrambled eggs, potato, cereals, orange juice, apple juice, milk, almond milk, and the best, an omelet station with an attentive cook.  There is even a convenience mini store on site with drinks, snacks, and toiletries.  The room has comfortable double queen beds and also a sofa bed pull out.  Night shades as well as a morning screen shade.  The check-in and check-out went perfectly.  Would consider staying here again,
Manager Response: It looks like you were able to experience many of our wonderful amenities.  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: I booked the hotel earlier in the day, and my reservation discount code indicated my stay would be free. I checked in and everything was as the reservation indicated. When I attempted to check out the next day, the front desk said I owed over $150 for the room and this price was changed in their system AFTER I had already checked in.
Manager Response: I sincerely apologize that this is the feeling you were left with after visiting our hotel.  In order to use the loyalty program free night stay, it does require a sufficient point balance in your World of Hyatt (formerly Hyatt Gold Passport) account.  Unfortunately, if there are not enough points when there is an attempt to debit them from your account, your reservation will then reflect the hotel’s best available rate.  I am sorry that you did not have a more enjoyable experience with us, but we do appreciate your feedback and hope that you will give Hyatt hotels another try in the future.

Summary: It was a pleasant stay from the time of check-in till the time I checked-out. The breakfast was delicious and had a good amount of food variety. The staff was very friendly and helpful in making sure that their customers were taken care of throughout the process...

The staff make this place the most comfortable place to stay.  They are not only friendly and helpful to their guests, but also to each other.  Because of this, Hyatt House is the most peaceful and enjoyable place to stay

The Hyatt House , Cypress ,CA Stayed for 3 day visit to Orange County and LA. The hotel is a great choice amidst a wide choice of places. The hotel provides everything a visitor would need to make their stay an all enjoyable one.  There is a free tasty breakfast buffet each morning with a wide variety of food items. The freshly made omelettes is a must .  There is free parking and wifi.  The room was very nice, completely smoke free and had a  modern décor and quiet.  Most important the staff was very courteous and attentive and made you feel welcomed. I would definitely recommend this Hyatt House , Cypress hotel to anyone looking for a great place to stay. anyone who looking for a place to stay .

Summary Heading: Cant sleep, car alarm all night long
Summary: Stayed at Hyatt House Cypress on Jan 28. A guests car alarm was going off in the parking lot every 20 to 30 minutes. Was not able to sleep all night. Called front desk, and all they kept saying is we will notify security, no alternative solution.

Hyatt house cypress/Anaheim 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻 Excellent service, clean rooms, fast checkin , online checkout , free parking , great breakfast, Hyatt honoured request for room upgrade without any issues.... thank you 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

I thought the location was excellent . would love to have beef patties or corn beef for breakfast. Some people don't eat pork. The room was beautiful it was just like being at home . The workout facility was great also, it was just enough to do some cardio. we also love the happy hour also the drinks and the food really hit the spot and the bar tender really knows how to make a good margarita

I was very pleased with my stay at Hyatt House - Cypress. I was there for two weeks and needed a place to stretch out a little and work. This place fit the bill. Fast, friendly and excellent house-keeping. I will return.

Very spacious, comfortable room at a great price. I loved the suite with separate living and sleeping areas. The room was very clean, beds were comfortable, and the free breakfast was plentiful and excellent. Loved that they have miso soup and other Asian essentials for breakfast! Kudos to the hard-working breakfast staff, for putting up with all those kids and morning madness. Staff all great. My only reservation was the poor condition of the morning breakfast rice...it was hard and old, they should have a good rice cooker in the buffet area to keep the rice soft, fluffy, and moist for us numerous Asians there!

We keep coming back to this hotel as it is amazingly clean, updated, friendly, and it has free wifi, parking and a GREAT breakfast!!  We use this for visiting Disneyland again and again.  It is 8 miles from the park, but the price and quality of this hotel make it a great bargain and worth the extra travel.

Summary Heading: Clean, roomy king suite, good value
Summary: This hotel is our go-to hotel when traveling for club sports.  The king suite has a pull out sofa bed and a full kitchen.  The room was clean and check-in was quick and easy. the hotel is a good value for traveling families.  Breakfast is included.

I stayed at the Hyatt House because it was close to Disneyland. There was a lot of kids that stayed in this hotel before the week of Christmas because every kid want to see Disneyland in the winter wonderland. It is very quiet hotel around the neighborhood. Close by is a couple of restaurants and Costco. I think all the rooms have a full kitchen that you can cook food in there. Would come back here again

It was a night stay over in OC before returning to Yucca Valley, CA.  We've never been to this location and did not know what to expect.  We arrived late and was upgraded to a suite.  Wow.  That made all the difference.  The interior of the hotel has been remodeled.  It has the 'Hyatt' feel from the moment we walked through the front door to check in.  The staff was wonderful.  Loved the color scheme and decor throughout.  The suite with a full size fridge was grrrreat.  Loved the updated walk-in shower.  The breakfast was included and adds a lot of value to the overall stay.  We had made-to-order omelette.  The breakfast spread was good.  Definitely recommend this hotel.

Our family of 3 really enjoyed our stay. We were in SoCal to visit family/friends and go to the Huntington Harbor Parade of Boats, Disney, and Universal Studios. This was our home base and really felt like a home away from home. The queen suite was spacious and modern.  The beds were comfortable. The shower pressure was sufficient but could have been better to rinse the conditioner out of my hair. We were on the 3rd floor facing the courtyard which provided a lovely view. We would definitely stay here again!

Summary Heading: Re: this Hyatt not walking distance to Disneyland!
Summary: I stayed here about 2 years ago and am planning to stay at this Hyatt Anaheim/Cypress again this month. As I was reading the reviews, others mentioned this is close to Disneyland. IT IS NOT, so I wanted to make readers aware in case you choose this one for your Disney visit. I've stayed at the other Hyatt house/places off Harbor Blvd as well. Those are closer and somewhat walking distance, but if you book this Hyatt Cypress, you will find that you may be driving distance about 8 miles to Disneyland. Cost will be lower than the ones near Disneyland though!

It's great to know you can make a reservation and know you are entering a highly recommended hotel!  My family loved the kitchen and great amenities here at the Hyatt! Oh and did I mention the pleasant breakfast? We are always glad to make the point if picking one of the best hotel's in Cypress CA..

I checked in during the night, I didn't notice all the different options to eat within walking distance from hotel. Service was great, room was big and clean. Breakfast was also very good omelettes made to order.

My daughter and I flew out to Los Angeles to attend my grandson's football game for Fullerton College! Fullerton College won the CCCAA State Championship! We are so proud! The Fullerton College Hornets played an awesome game, winning 29-27!

The staff were friendly and responsive, and the room was clean and comfortable. The complimentary breakfast offered great variety and was superior in quality, especially for the price of the room. Parking was also free and easy access. I would definitely recommend.

Front desk reception were nice I was upgraded to suite room without even asking perfect for family as they room has a small kitchen. Theres a mini grocery store at the lobby. Staff are friendly. Would stay again nxt time.

it is a nice hotel, location is nice with the Outlet mall close by (20 min walk) it is also surrounded by stores like Target, walgreens, dollar store (good quality products), Subway, Of course it is very close to Disneyland !!!

Decided to visit area where my wife and I grew up. Staying at the Hyatt house Cypress/Anaheim did not disappoint, clean, quite, centrally located. An excellent hotel for business, family or simply to relax. Stay was all we could ask for!

Summary Heading: Quiet location, spacious room, great people, what else?
Summary: Well located, just in the middle of everything nice to do, not too far from Buena Park and other shopping places. Staff was a pleasure to deal with and understandable. Breakfast was excellent. I would 100% recommend this place and go back there again.

Lots of restaurants nearby, very good breakfast, service top notch. Easy and very friendly check in.  Very easy online checkout.  Heated pools, Parking is plentiful and feee .  Fits a full size yukon.  Co

I highly recommend this hotel if internet speed is not important to you during your stay.  Internet connection was strong, but the speed didn't match a hotel of this caliber.  If you get tired of eating out during your extended time away from home, the kitchenettes in the rooms make it easy to eat in.  The hotel is clean and well maintained.

Very nice hotel. Modern interiors. Room was decorated in modern furniture. All very squared off! Clean room & bath. Large shower. Room was very small but comfortable. Staff was friendly. Liked the fire pit in the central courtyard. Did not try the free breakfast as we had plans to visit Dalton's Diner (you should try it).

Location was great. The room needed to be much cleaner. The staff was very attentive. You need to ask for skin lotion it is not in the room. You can here other people walking in the hallway and any othe loud noises the the rooms.

Nice hotel pool is small but OK. Rooms are Clean ! Bedroom Suite is good a little cramped but Clean and comfortable!  The breakfast is a bit insane to deal with. But with the awesome staff they make it works and are ready to please.   The Omelet bar is the highlight.   Coffee is good.    Good location.   Alexa was awesome!

Clean, with full kitchen and utensils! Always clean and tidy.  Has a pool and hot tub...the breakfast had great options even soup, eggs, and several warm options.  The staff was professional and went above and beyond what was expected to keep everyone comfortable, example the bartendar was great help with food and beverage

We had a great stay here as a family of four. It is centrally located between Disneyland and actual Los Angeles, which is what we were looking for. It was nice to have a separate room than our children, and the breakfast was delicious, from fresh made omelets to delicious french toast. I would definitely stay here again

Hello.  I am a Hyatt Diamond member. But when i check in the hotel i didn't received room upgrade. Rather received a small size room below average size. I never seen small size room like it.  Also I couldn't sleep whole night. Because it happened strange sounds at refrigerator while whole night. so I called to the hotel step. But he told me that some refrigerator has problem in room. And then he recommended just turning off the refrigerator. I have been staid at same place. it was great experience. But this time, I was very disappointed. I feeling that My points became waste.

Really the management of the hotel is far and above all others in the area they really take care of important customers like me like giving me free water and cookie and nice rooms that's why I keep on coming back

I had an ok stay at the Hyatt House in Cypress, CA.  When I checked in, I was greeted by a pleasant receptionist and the check in process was efficient.  After moving my luggages into the room, I found several ants in the room.  When I called the front desk to ask for a new room, I was told the hotel was sold out but they would sprayed the ants the next day.  There were less ants the next day after house cleaning, but I still noticed few ants on the day we checked out, so I again notified the front desk.  I was not offered any compensation for the trouble, which disappointed me greatly.  I don't expect much compensation, but the fact that nothing was offered makes me feel the hotel didn't take my issue seriously.  I wanted to like the hotel because I've always had a good

Summary Heading: Forget the Anaheim also-rans--this place is the best.
Summary: We stay in hotels every month of the year for business. The attention to detail, modern look, staff you won't believe, super morning free breakfasts ... do yourself a huge favor (you deserve it) check this place out.  Runs circles around all the other places we stay.

Summary Heading: A nice change from the crowded the resort hotels
Summary: We used this hotel as the base for our trip – 4 days at Disneyland, 3 days at the beaches.  My wife and I with a 7 and 10 year old stayed  in a 1 BR suite with 2 queens.  Overall, this was a great hotel for our needs.  Service – was good and everyone was very friendly.  We were missing a pan in our room, called front desk and they brought one up within minutes.  The room cleaning service was really late the first day (4pm) – we decline it since we had gotten back from the park and wanted to relax.  We figured out that if we hung the orange sign on our door lever, they seemed to clean the room much earlier.  Hotel Common Areas – this hotel must have been recently renovated and everything looks new and clean.  Pool and Hot Tub was great – kids and I used it almost every late

We had a vacation to LA and Disneyland and tried the Hyatt House for the first time because of its proximity to Disney.  Unfortunately, no shuttle was available as some previous customers stated there were.  Otherwise, it was a great stay.  We enjoyed it!

This property is clean, convenient and an incredible value! The rooms have an excellent layout and are always clean. The food is restaurant quality. The pool area is clean and fun for kids with a fire pit!

This hotel is quite busy on weekends and the staff keeps up with the guests very well. The best is their free breakfasts with great chefs cooking superb omelets to your taste. Plenty of parking, very comfortable 1 BR suites with kitchenettes and balcony view of the pool. During the week you'll find corporate travelers that enjoy a nice dinner at the grill/bar. A huge outside gas fireplace will warm your feet as the evenings can get cooler. We enjoyed this hotel in the middle of a business district and very close to Knots Berry Farm/Disneyland.

Staying at this hotel 4 nights this week. So far have spent 3 nights and not once has housekeeping done a good job.  There are now 3 empty (Hyatt) shampoo bottles and 2 conditioner bottles in the bathtub that she has not thrown out. She has not cleaned the microwave or refrigerator that has finger prints all over from previous guests. This afternoon I picked up 3 pieces of white lint from the carpet right after she left. I do not have any white clothes. She must have dropped the lint from the towels or sheets. She never cleans the floor.   In the room there is a advertisement for their breakfast. It mentions "THICK-CUT Bacon".   The bacon is super thin, turkey bacon.  NOT THICK-CUT BACON. Front desk staff is very friendly.

Summary Heading: Best business hotel around Anaheim area
Summary: This was my second time with GM ALAN who was extremely humble humorous and helpful even though my room(248) was noisy due to court yard noises. Breakfast was gtately improved to one of the best if not the best.healthy food addition was great ! Location was very convenient to go around. Free shuttle bus was also A plus. Only complaint I had was there should be sign announcing quiet time start at 10 pm at the court yard like many hotels do.

Really clean and modern room/ hotel. Got free parking, free wifi, and free breakfast! Definitely staying with them again! The hotel staff was really nice. When we checked in they surprised me with a complimentary upgrade to a suite!

Hyatt house is a lovely place to stay. Close to all amenities and a short drive to Fisneyland and Knots Berry Farm.Close to my relatives and friends. Overal  Cleanliness and service was excellent. Will recommend to my friends.

Summary Heading: My Go-To Place when staying in Orange County
Summary: Since the renovation, this is one of my favorite hotels in CA. When my family travels to CA we always stay here and it's perfect for families due to being able to book a multi-room suite with extended stay capabilities.

Nice and roomy. Clean and comfortable. Stayed here on a business trip and the staff in the hotel was very prompt and professional. Rooms were very nice and comfortable. Enjoyed our stay. I would recommend the Hyatt House for anyone that is looking to have nice comfortable stay.

Summary Heading: Great stay for our family of 6
Summary: We stayed at Hyatt House Cypress for a 5 day trip to Knott's Berry Farm, Universal Studios, and the beach. Our experience here was great and we will be making this our new go to hotel for future Disney trips. Here are the highlights.  Location: just a few minutes from Knott's Berry Farm and Disneyland. There were also many restaurants and stores within a 4 mile radius. The hotel itself is tucked away from the main roads so we didn't experience any traffic noise. Plenty of parking in the lot and no parking charges. Breakfast: the free breakfast was great with many options. Fruit, oatmeal, pastries, miso soup, made to order omelets. Each day had hot options as well, scrambled eggs, a breakfast meat, and potatoes. Also great almond milk which was appreciated.  Room: large room fit

Summary Heading: 部屋は綺麗ですがサービスに問題あり
Summary: 2週間滞在しました。 部屋は非常に広く快適です。炊飯器はないですがキッチンがあるには良かったです。バスタブのある部屋をリクエストしたところ、きちんとアサインしてくれました。 ただしハウスキーピングのサービスは非常に悪くがっかりさせられました。 滞在中、廊下にスプーンが落ちてたり、カーペットの床の掃除が足りなくて汚いことが何度もありました。 朝食には味噌汁とご飯、海苔があります。(納豆はなかったです)ただし美味しくはないですし毎日だと飽きるので長期の場合は朝食なしの方がいいかもしれません。オムレツステーションは美味しいですがオムレツしかできないそうなので毎日だと飽きます。 ベーグルがあるのは良かったですがコーヒーは日本人の口にはあいません フロントスタッフは非常に親切でフレンドリーでした。 サイプレスに再訪する際はまた予約したいと思います。ハウスキーピングのクオリティさえ改善されれば快適に泊まれるホテルだと思います。  I stayed here for 2 weeks. Nice room. There are no rice cooker but it was good to stay room with kitchenette. I sent email to assign me room with bathtub, they accepted my request.  I had to disappoint for room cleaning several times during my stay. Some housekeeping agents are very rough. They need to improve cleaning skill. Carpet floor was often dirty, I found dirty

Hyatt is my preferred hotel when traveling, and this was by far the worst experience I have ever had at a Hyatt property. When we checked in the front desk agent made no attempt of conversation and barely said two words to us. They didn't tell us pool hours, when breakfast, or any important hotel information. I went back down to the lobby that evening to see if they had milk/where I could buy some close by. The agent (the same one who checked us in) was checking someone else in, so I waited at the second window until he was done. Once he was finished, he looked at me briefly, then looked back at his computer. The next night was even worse. When we returned to the room that evening, I called down to the front desk for a bottle opener. I called three times and no one ever

Nice clean hotel with friendly staff.  Awesome buffet breakfast included daily with fresh fruit, variety of cereals, scramble eggs, toast, bagels, potatoes, made to order omelets are yum, on alternate days there is also either bacon, sausage, meat paddies or warm ham to go with your breakfast, apple or orange juice & selection of fresh milk 2%, almond etc.  Breakfast can get busy but you can eat out by the pool which is nice, suggest going early or 20mins before closing 9.30am weekdays and 10am weekends, they pack up super fast but you can stay longer to eat so grab everything you want to eat at once & put in your omelet order before 9.30.  Pool & spa very nice with pool towels provided by hotel at the pool which we found very convenient no need to use your own.  We had a two

I travel twice/year here, and the staff is always courteous, attentive, and professional. Free breakfast and wifi (that works); happy hour 5-8 pm with craft beer, fire pit, pool, and hot tub! Efficiency rooms are clean and recently updated; beach nearby.  Love this place!

The new management in this hotel has moved its rating from a 4 star to 5--super friendly staff, awesome free breakfasts, modern redecorating. Only one drawback: super slow and glitchy wifi connection, otherwise, worth every penny.

My boyfriend & I fell in love with this hotel. From beginning to end, great & well maintained property, excellent customer service, kind housekeepers, absolutely no complaints. They even surprised me with a complimentary cake on my birthday! Thoughtful gesture indeed. Thank you Hyatt House.

Love the new upgrades!  We have stayed at this location before and have always had great service. The beds are very comfortable and the newly upgrades in the rooms made the stay very comfortable. The newly decorated lobby and restaurant was nicely done.

Traveling for business, one tends to get to stay at many different hotels.  I always stay at the Hyatt House in Cypress when my job takes me to that area.  The staff are like long time friends that truly are concerned with my comfort.  I always feel like I have arrived home and can relax.  I love this place!

Clean rooms with plenty of space.  The breakfast buffet is awesome.  The staff was all very friendly and helpful.  The location is great - close enough to Disney and Knott's Berry Farm but far enough away to stay out of the crowd.  It is also convenient to hit the interstate for a short (less than an hour) to go to L.A. and Hollywood.

Love the room since it comes with its own kitchen and leaving room separate from the rooms them selfs. Like that also comes with forks,spoons,knives plates and cups,pots and pans to use in the stove if necessary can't wait for our next vacation and stay in at the hotel...

Excellent place to stay for families. Home like feel to the guest rooms. Breakfast was a nice treat, great way to start the day. Staff is very friendly and accommodating. Will stay here again in the future.

My room had a kitchen with microwave, full size refrigerator, nice bar to sit at, and full dishes, toaster, and coffee pot to use.  Updated room.  TV is basic cable.  No pay-per-view movies, and no in room food or drink besides coffee.  TVs are flat screened but dark and no way to adjust the picture.  Shower and toilet in separate room than the one sink.  A little crowded by the bathroom as the toilet/shower door opens in front of the sink and closet.  Beds were comfortable.  Wrap around couch had a pull out bed. One of the TVs was on the wall in the bedroom behind the door so if you're wanting a good angle to watch the TV you'll have to lay on the right side of the bed! Breakfast was great.  Both mornings I was there you had scrambled eggs, potatoes, sausage/bacon,

10 min drive to knotts. Very quiet sleep and comfortable beds. Easy check in. It's a four star due to the cramped breakfast area. The line for omlettes took forever and blocked other people from accessing the other items. After talking to staff, they are thinking about redesigning the layout and possibly move the omlette station to improve the flow.

Great hotel and great experience.  Clean and staff is very attentive. Breakfast was wonderful. OH..........IO.  The staff from check in to check out was wonderful.  Nice poolong area. Great location to eat breakfast in the morning outside in the sun; or you can eat inside.  OH........IO

Awesome stay the room is clean comfortable and great for the family. Kids love the pool and jacuzzi felt an apartment because we were able to cook our own meals. The beds were comfortable and the ice machine in the fridge is awesome.

Overall hotel is good except that we stayed on first floor and near the pool area where its too noisy at times. Walls are also thin and we're able to hear noises out in the hallway and neighbor slamming door.

Hyatt house cypress is Very nice property. 15 min to disney land. I found it Clean, Spacious. front desk is always welcoming and extending support. Breakfast has different options and they make omeletes on order

Nicely remodeled property featuring large suites with kitchens.  Good breakfast with made to order omelettes.  Full service bar and short-order evening menu served till 11pm. Exceptionally friendly and helpful staff.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel with possibility for Barbecue
Summary: We choose this Hotel for our summer vacation because I know it from various business trips! Very nice Hotel which allows private barbecue in the Garden! Friendly people and nice big rooms including smal kitchen!

While this hotel was a little bit of a drive from the beaches (my main reason for visiting), it was worth it!  Good clean hotel, good service, and no parking fees, unlike most other hotels in OC! The staff was also attentive to my requests for an upgrade, being a Platinum member.

I enjoyed my stay at the Hyatt House. The visit was to celebrate my boyfriend's birthday. We enjoyed every moment. The staff was very helpful and the food was delicious. The hotel is very clean and I loved the free cookies that came with the suite.

Summary Heading: The best Baby Shower Gift ever!
Summary: When I checked in, the front desk realized my room was incorrectly booked.  They immediately corrected my stay and upgraded my room for free to the presidential suite.  I have to admit this was the best stay ever!

Awesome place with awesome facilities. Room service very good. Good breakfast. Gym,pool facilities available . Also the suite rooms R very spacious and comfortable. Staff is so very nice. U get the free shuttle with in 5 miles with pick And drop facility. Loved all the facilities and services.

Room was booked for a girls overnight trip. We needed a place that was near Buena Park , but not in a over populated down town area. Staff was amazing, rooms were very clean & well laid out.
